TID_ARCHER2_ABILITY_HELP: Invisible to defenses for the first <num> seconds
TID_ARCHER_QUEEN_INFO: The Archer Queen is an eagle-eyed warrior, whose weapon of choice is a modified X-Bow that few men could dream of wielding. She can attack enemy villages or guard your village.
TID_ARCHER_QUEEN_INFO_SHORT: Her X-Bow breaks buildings as easily as she breaks hearts.
TID_ARCHER_TOWER2_INFO: No foe can escape the Archer's arrows. This tower has a special switch - choose long range or fast attack!
TID_ARCHER_TOWER_INFO: Archer Towers have longer range than cannons, and unlike cannons they can attack flying enemies.
TID_ARCHER_TOWER_INFO_SHORT: Its Archers shoot down any attacker.
TID_ARMY_OVERVIEW_HINT_CLAN_CASTLE: Join a Clan to receive Clan Castle Troops, Spells and Siege Machines
TID_ARMY_OVERVIEW_HINT_SIEGE: Siege Machines unlock at Town Hall level 12
TID_ARRANGED_WAR_SELECT_MEMBERS_HINTS: Friendly Wars award no loot or Clan XP
TID_ARTILLERY_INFO: The Eagle Artillery has nearly unlimited range and targets tough enemies with exploding shells. However, it won't activate until a large amount of troops have been deployed.
TID_ARTILLERY_INFO_SHORT: Destroys armies from the other side of the Village.
TID_ARTO_BUILDING_INFO: Home and charging dock for Master Builder's latest invention! Once fully upgraded, O.T.T.O becomes an additional builder in Builder Base and enables the Master Builder to freely travel between the two villages!
TID_ARTO_TASK_BATTLE_MACHINE_FLUFF: Automation is tricky. Luckily, the Battle Machine is a totally safe and villager-friendly platform to test things out on.
TID_ARTO_TASK_CANNON_CART_FLUFF: Wheels can be hard to get right. Perfecting the Cannon Cart is a great way to make sure those axles are lined up.
TID_ARTO_TASK_GEAR_UP: \nComplete by Gearing Up three buildings in the Home Village.
TID_ARTO_TASK_GEAR_UP_FLUFF: Advanced technology requires advanced thinking! Completing some special projects back in Home Village will provide critical insights.
TID_ARTO_TASK_MEGA_TESLA_FLUFF: Sufficient power is vital for any project and a fully built Mega Tesla can supply way too much of it!
TID_ARTO_UNLOCKED_INFO: The Master Builder can now travel between villages! Just tap the Builder Hall and send Master Builder across the sea. You can always send him back by tapping Master Builder's Hut in the Home Village!
TID_ASK_LEADERSHIP_START_RAID: Ask a Leader or Co-leader to join the Raid Weekend

Players who violate our Safe and Fair Play policy disrupt the game for everyone and your report helps us to identify them.

Yours,
Supercell

TID_BABY_DRAGON_INFO: This fire-breathing hatchling is shy around other air units, but leave it alone and it'll throw a fit! When not around other air units, Baby Dragons become enraged and gain bonus damage and attack speed.
TID_BALLOON2_ABILITY_HELP: Deals <num2> damage and spawns <num> Skeletons when destroyed
TID_BALLOON_HASTE_EVENT_INFO: Balloons zip through fast-lanes made from Haste Spells. Create both at a discount. Zoom boom!
TID_BARB2_ABILITY_HELP: Speed and damage are increased for the first <num> seconds
TID_BARBARIAN_KING_INFO: The Barbarian King is the toughest and meanest barbarian in all the realm, whose appetite for Dark Elixir has caused him to grow to a giant size. He can attack enemy villages or guard your village.

TID_BUILDING_BOMB_TOWER_INFO: Bomb Towers bombard nearby ground troops and go up in a big BOOM when destroyed! Melee units best stand clear!
TID_BUILDING_BOMB_TOWER_INFO_SHORT: All about making ground troops go boom, even when destroyed.
TID_BUILDING_CAP_REACHED: You've already built the maximum amount of these buildings.
TID_BUILDING_CRUSHER_INFO: The Crusher REALLY likes its personal space. This hulking stone slams ground units with a mighty wallop!
TID_BUILDING_MONOLITH_INFO: The Builder's first experiment in using Dark Elixir for a building resulted in something truly frightful. The stronger the Monolith's target, the more damage it does. Great to have defending your Village, but a little scary to attack against.
TID_BUILDING_MONOLITH_INFO_SHORT: The stronger its target, the harder it hits.
TID_BUILDING_PART_LOCKED_BY_REPUTATION: This part becomes available at capital reputation level <level>
TID_BUILDING_SCATTERSHOT_INFO: The Scattershot heaves very heavy bundles of poorly tied together rocks at whoever happens to be closest. The bundles break apart on impact and deal additional damage to the troops behind.
TID_BUILDING_SPELL_TOWER_INFO: For years, Wizards alone brought magic to the battlefield one fireball at a time. Now they've developed a fully automated way to give your village more ways to mess up attackers with magic!
TID_BUILDING_SPELL_TOWER_INFO_SHORT: Turn Spells against attackers at last!

TID_CADPA:
《部落冲突》适龄提示：
1）本游戏是一款战争策略类游戏，适用于年满12周岁及以上的用户，建议未成年人在家长监护下使用游戏产品。
2）本游戏以荒蛮原始的孤岛为背景，讲述了原始部落为生存而相互抗争的故事，涉及的情节、环境、场景均为虚构，不会与现实生活相混淆。游戏玩法基于一定难度的思维判断，设有竞技对抗比赛，鼓励玩家提升和挑战自我。游戏中有基于文字和语音的陌生人社交系统。
3）根据国家相关要求，游戏中有用户实名认证系统，未通过实名认证的用户不可进入游戏；认证为未成年人的用户除周五、周六、周日及法定节假日每日20时至21时外其他时间均不可进入游戏。
游戏中部分玩法和道具需要付费。根据腾讯健康系统管理规定，认证为未成年人的用户将接受以
管理：
未满12周岁的用户不能付费；12周岁以上未满16周岁的未成年人用户，单次充值金额不得超过50元人民币，每月充值金额累计不得超过200元人民币；16周岁以上的未成年人用户，单次充值金额不得超过100元人民币，每月充值金额累计不得超过400元人民币。
4）本游戏内所包含的对抗玩法需要玩家进行策略规划和推理判断，有助于帮助玩家提升逻辑思维能力。游戏设有需组队进行的大型团队任务和比赛，鼓励玩家互相配合完成比赛，有助于培养玩家的团队协作能力。游戏提供了丰富的社交系统，包括好友、公会等，玩家之间可以互相交流，互相配合，共同完成游戏任务，有助于促进玩家的社会交流，维持良好的社群关系。

TID_CANNON2_INFO: The iconic ground defense, built to last! This classic makes the Master Builder a bit sentimental.
TID_CANNON_ABILITY_HELP: Cannon keeps shooting after cart is destroyed with <num2> temporary hitpoints
TID_CANNOT_ADD_MEMBER_TO_WAR_COOLDOWN: This player is not yet eligible for war
TID_CANNOT_SWITCH_TO_ACCOUNT_WITHOUT_SUP: Chief <name>'s village with Town Hall level <number> has been found! Load it by logging in with your Supercell ID.
TID_CANNOT_SWITCH_TO_ACCOUNT_WITHOUT_TEN: Chief <name>'s village with Town Hall level <number> has been found! Load it by logging in with the registered WeChat or QQ account?
TID_CANT_SIGN_UP_RAID_NO_ARMY: Reach Capital Hall level 2 to take part in Raid Weekends!
TID_CAN_COPY_ONLY_TH_CLOSER_TO_YOUR_OWN: Can't copy layout with a Town Hall more than one level higher or lower from your own.
TID_CAPBUILD_AIRBOMBS_INFO: For heavyweight air defense, Air Bombs do the trick. An endless supply of explosive barrels launch into the sky to ravage flying enemies!
TID_CAPBUILD_AIR_DEFENSE_INFO: This anti-air tower is deadly against flying enemies, but can't target foes on the ground. Place it wisely to cover as much airspace as possible.
TID_CAPBUILD_ARMY_FIELD_INFO: A nice field for your clan's army to hang out in while waiting for raids to happen. Can be upgraded to increase available housing space.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_ARCHER_INFO: Training ground for Sneaky Archers. Watch out for sneaky sharp flying objects.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_BALLOON_INFO: There's no time for safety when there's Rocket Balloons to be built. The only rule is GOTTA GO FAST!
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_BARBARIAN_INFO: Sparring area for Super Barbarians. Smells like bravado and sweat.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_BATTLERAM_INFO: This bad boy can fit so many Battle Rams inside!
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_CANNONCART_INFO: Workshop for Raid Carts. It's clear how the Carts are put together, but where are the Barbarians coming from?
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_DRAGON_INFO: In hindsight, wood might not be the best material for housing Dragons. It's a wonder the building hasn't caught on fire yet.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_GIANT_INFO: Home of Super Giants. There's training equipment scattered absolutely everywhere!
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_HOG_RIDER_INFO: Incessant yelling echoing from within. I guess the Riders and Gliders are happy to see each other.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_INFERNO_DRAGON_INF: A fun place for Inferno Dragons to hang out together. Constructed of the most fireproof material Grand Builder could find.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_MEGAAIR_INFO: A construction yard for Flying Fortresses. High in the mountains perhaps because the builder doubted whether it would fly.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_MEGAGROUND_INFO: A giant, golem shaped hole in the ground. Hopefully a new hole isn't needed every time.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_MEGAPEKKA_INFO: How on earth does the Super P.E.K.K.A fit inside? In pieces?
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_MINION_INFO: Thanks to the new method, our Minions now come in Horde Size!
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_SKELETON_BARREL_IN: It's actually a barrel workshop with a graveyard next to it, run by balloon salesman.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_SUPER_DRAGON_INFO: In hindsight, wood might not be the best material for housing Dragons. It's a wonder the building hasn't caught on fire yet.
TID_CAPBUILD_BARRACKS_WIZARD_INFO: It looks like a barracks for Super Wizards, but continuous explosions are making it scary to get closer.
TID_CAPBUILD_BLAST_BOW_INFO: Blast Bow finally gives a definitive answer to an age-old question: how dangerous would arrows the size of tree trunks be? Perhaps not surprisingly, very dangerous.
TID_CAPBUILD_BOMBTOWER_INFO: Bomb Towers bombard nearby ground troops and go up in a big BOOM when destroyed! Melee units best stand clear!
TID_CAPBUILD_CANNON_INFO: This cannon might be slow firing, but it makes up for it in punch. Additional drawback is that it doesn't tilt high enough to reach air targets.
TID_CAPBUILD_CAPHQ_INFO: The heart of the Capital! Upgrade to unlock new Districts and additional building upgrades in Capital Peak.
TID_CAPBUILD_CRUSHER_INFO: The Crusher REALLY likes its personal space. This hulking stone slams ground units with a mighty wallop!
TID_CAPBUILD_DISHQ_INFO: Villagers and the Grand Builder take care of this district from here. Upgrade to unlock additional building upgrades in this district.
TID_CAPBUILD_GUARDPOST_CART_INFO: If a Raid Cart could feel happy, blasting at attackers would make it happy
TID_CAPBUILD_GUARDPOST_DRAGONS_INFO: Super Dragons are very territorial and will roast any attackers.
TID_CAPBUILD_GUARDPOST_GIANTS_INFO: Super Giants are ready to deliver a solid punch to any intruding troops.
TID_CAPBUILD_INFERNO_INFO: Bane of all big troops, the Inferno Tower can deal devastating damage to units it stays focused on.
TID_CAPBUILD_MEGATESLA_INFO: What happens when a Hidden Tesla goes Mega? It's powerful jolt deals heavy damage to even the toughest units!
TID_CAPBUILD_MINION_CRYPT_INFO: Built over an underground hive, this defense opens to release a swarm of extremely territorial and extremely dangerous Mini-Minions to take down any attacker.
TID_CAPBUILD_MULTICANNON_INFO: It's a cannon with many barrels!
TID_CAPBUILD_MULTIMORTAR_INFO: Fires long range splash damage multiple times to maximize chances of hitting its target!
TID_CAPBUILD_RAPID_ROCKETS_INFO: This tightly packed bundle of rockets has a shorter range compared to the Air Defense, but makes up for it by packing a meaner punch.
TID_CAPBUILD_REFLECTOR_INFO: Nobody would expect a whirling contraption of shields to reflect any attack back at the attacker... But that's exactly what the Reflector does.
TID_CAPBUILD_ROCKET_INFO: Hurls exploding rockets at both air and ground targets. Miraculously they never miss!
TID_CAPBUILD_SPEAR_THROWER_INFO: Throws big spears at enemies on the ground and in the air. Very intimidating.
TID_CAPBUILD_SPELLLAB_FREEZE_INFO: Brews big kegs of Frost Spell. Visitors are advised to bring warm clothing!
TID_CAPBUILD_SPELLLAB_GRAVEYARD_INFO: Brews big kegs full of Graveyard Spell. Please kindly ignore the sound of rattling bones.
TID_CAPBUILD_SPELLLAB_HEAL_INFO: Brews big kegs of Heal Spell. The flowery smell makes headaches magically go away!
TID_CAPBUILD_SPELLLAB_JUMP_INFO: Brews big kegs of Jump Spell. The whole building looks like it's about to take off.
TID_CAPBUILD_SPELLLAB_LIGHTNING_INFO: Brews big kegs of Lightning Spell. Everyone close by is having a bad hair day.
TID_CAPBUILD_SPELLLAB_RAGE_INFO: Brews big kegs full of Rage Spell. Just being near it makes people irrationally angry.
TID_CAPBUILD_SPELL_STORAGE_INFO: Spell Storage holds the Capital's brewed spells. Upgrade to increase Spell capacity in Raids.
TID_CAPBUILD_SUPERWIZARDTOWER_INFO: Super Wizards' electrickery is shockingly powerful against swarms of attackers, as it bounces to everyone too close to the initial target.
TID_CAPBUILD_WALL_INFO: Walls protect districts and keep enemies at bay.\n\nA district's Walls are always the same level and upgrade at the same time. Build together, battle together, upgrade walls together!
TID_CAPITAL_ARMY_SAVE_FAILED_SPELL_NOT_A: Not all selected spells are available in this Clan.
TID_CAPITAL_ARMY_SAVE_FAILED_TOO_MANY_SP: Too many spells for this Clan.
TID_CAPITAL_ARMY_SAVE_FAILED_TOO_MANY_UN: Too many troops for this Clan.
TID_CAPITAL_ARMY_SAVE_FAILED_UNIT_NOT_AV: Not all selected troops are available in this Clan.
TID_CAPITAL_ARMY_SAVE_INVALID: Unable to save invalid Capital army
TID_CAPITAL_ARMY_SAVE_PENDING: Please wait. Capital army is being saved
TID_CAPITAL_FRIENDLT_ARMY_DATA_NOT_AVAIL: Please wait until Capital Army data is available
TID_CAPITAL_FROST_INFO: In the heat of battle it's important to stay frosty!\n\nUse the Frost Spell to slow down defenses and defenders or to create an ice bridge over water.
TID_CAPITAL_GOLD_INFO: Capital Gold is gained from the Forge and as loot from Capital Raids. Use it on upgrades in the Clan Capital.
TID_CAPITAL_GRAVEYARD_INFO: Seriously spooky magic allows this Spell to raise the fallen!\n\nWhen any Troop falls on the battlefield this spell summons a number of Skeletons based on its housing space. Flying Troops result in flying Skeletons.
TID_CAPITAL_HALL_LEVEL_TOO_LOW: You need to upgrade your Capital Hall to level <number>!
TID_CAPITAL_JUMP_INFO: Walls and Water in your way? Cast this spell over them to create a route straight over. Your troops will jump over like there was nothing in their way!
TID_CAPITAL_LOCKED_CLAN_LEVEL_TOO_LOW: Clan Capital unlocks at Clan Level <level>
TID_CAPITAL_LOCKED_JOIN_CLAN: You need to be in a Clan to go to the Clan Capital
TID_CAPITAL_LOCKED_PLAYER_LEVEL_TOO_LOW: Clan Capital unlocks at Town Hall Level <level>
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_CLEAN_UP: Now destroy the remaining defenses. Feel free to experiment!
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_DEPLOY_AREA_EXPLA: You cannot deploy units from every direction in Capital attacks.
The initial deployment area is located inside the tall grass.
The deployment area expands when you destroy buildings and Walls in its way.
Note how the deployment area expands afterwards.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_FROST: <c38eaff>Frost spells</c> can be used to slow down defences and freeze water to make it passable for ground troops.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_FROST_2: Deploy the <c38eaff>Frost spell</c> here so you can attack the enemy defenses from behind.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_GATES: Defensive units cannot jump in Capital, but they can walk through Gates.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_GATES_2: For attackers Gates work exactly like Walls.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_GATES_3: These poor <cf70d16>Super Giants</c> have been locked inside their compartment.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_GATES_4: They are easy targets for your ranged units.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_INTRO: A Clanmate has already attacked this District. Let's continue where they left off!
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_INTRO_2: They damaged and destroyed some buildings and left a <cffe346>Heal spell</c>.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_JUMP: <c85ff3b>Jump spells</c> can be used to jump over Walls, rivers and coastal water.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_JUMP_2: <c85ff3b>Jump spells</c> also allow the deployment area to expand. Deploy the spell here.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_JUMP_3: <c85ff3b>Jump spells</c> cannot be used to jump over cliffs or open water.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_SNEAKY_ARCHERS: Deploy <c54a0fe>Sneaky Archers</c> to destroy <cf70d16>Multi Cannons</c> behind the Wall.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_SPELL_EXPLANATION: Spells do not have timers in Capital.
They stay for the entire attack and also for the next attacker. After that they disappear.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_SUPER_BARBARIANS: Deploy <c54a0fe>Super Barbarians</c> to destroy some buildings.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_SUPER_GIANTS: Deploy <c54a0fe>Super Giants</c> to soak up damage.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_SUPER_GIANTS_2: Reinforce the attack with some more <c54a0fe>Super Giants</c>.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_SUPER_WIZARDS: Deploy <c54a0fe>Super Wizards</c> to destroy <cf70d16>Spear Throwers</c> and <cf70d16>Bomb Towers</c> behind the Walls.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_SUPER_WIZARDS_2: <c54a0fe>Super Wizards</c> have slightly shorter range than <c54a0fe>Sneaky Archers</c>.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_WALL_EXPLANATION: Ground troops cannot walk around Walls which are connected to water, cliffs or the edge of the district.
TID_CAPITAL_PLAYGROUND_WALL_EXPLANATION_: That is why they needed to destroy the Wall to reach the <cf70d16>Cannon</c>.
TID_CAPITAL_RAID_ATTACKER_LEFT_THE_CLAN: You have already attacked with another clan
TID_CAPITAL_RAID_DEFENSE_MEDALS_ALT_GEMS: You received <num> Gems from Capital Raid Weekend defensive rewards
TID_CAPITAL_RAID_DISTRICT_STILL_LOCKED: You cannot attack this district yet
TID_CAPITAL_RAID_NOTWEEKEND_STARTED_NOTI: Time to raid! Attack rival Clan Capitals and ascend to victory.
TID_CAPITAL_RAID_OFFENSE_MEDALS_ALT_GEMS: You received <num> Gems from Capital Raid Weekend offensive rewards
TID_CAPITAL_RAID_SEASON_FULL: Your clan reached the maximum number of members in this Raid Weekend
TID_CAPITAL_RAID_SEASON_REWARD: You received <num> Raid Medals from the Raid Weekend.
TID_CAPITAL_RAID_WEEKEND_ENDSOON_NOTIFIC: Raid Weekend is ending soon! Finish your attacks!
TID_CAPITAL_RAID__WEEKEND_STARTED_NOTIFI: Raid Weekend has begun! Attack rival Clan Capitals and ascend to victory.
TID_CAPITAL_REWARD_END_BATTLE: Raid Medals added to your Clan Capital Chest
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_1: Chief, there's someone wanting to talk to you. He seems quite... rude.
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_10: Although... this one is still my favorite.
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_11: Why don´t you get going and see how you can help?
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_2: Why is everything here so tiny? Is this a village for ants?
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_3: Oh finally. Hurry along, there's a lot to do and not much time. Chop chop.
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_4: Now THIS is a proper scale for building. Behold, this mountain is your Clan's Capital!
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_5: All great Clans build together and battle together. Just a hint from a wise old man.
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_6: Let's start from the top shall we?
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_7: Capital Peak has everything you need. A hot spring, comfortable cabins and the Capital Hall.
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_8: The stronger you make your Capital Hall, the more Districts will be unlocked for you to build in.
TID_CAPITAL_TUTORIAL_9: Each District has different buildings and terrain. They are all very useful for making your Capital stronger.
TID_CHALLENGE_ATTACK_CODE_HINT: Challenge a friend to attack your village with this code! Your Clash Friends can also directly accept this challenge from their Friends List.
TID_CHALLENGE_CANT_REQUEST: Join a Clan to request Clan Castle Troops, Spells and Siege Machines
TID_CHALLENGE_FAIL_SERVER: Unable to start the challenge, please try again!
TID_CHALLENGE_FAIL_SERVER_ALREADY_IN_PRO: Unable to start the challenge! Previous challenge is in progress!
TID_CHALLENGE_FRIEND_CONTENT: Challenge a friend to attack your village
TID_CHALLENGE_HEADER: Challenge your Clan member to attack your village
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2012: Clash of Clans launches worldwide and the fun begins!
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2013: Heroes, the first Dark Elixir Troops and Town Hall 10 arrive!
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2014: Clans can finally Clash in Clan Wars! Heroes gain Abilities and the Lava Hound joins.
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2015: Grand Warden arrives along with Town Hall 11. The first Dark Spells arrive. Town Halls suddenly find themselves inside the base...
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2016: The Clash world grows with the the launch of Clash Royale. Friendly Challenges and Wars are added. Bowlers, Miners and Baby Dragons arrive.
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2017: Builder Base is discovered on the far side of the sea. The Strongman turns up with the first Clan Games and Magic Items.
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2018: Town Hall 12 and the Electrodragon are electrifying additions. Siege Machines, Clan War League and the Trader also arrive to shake things up.
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2019: Season Challenges and Hero Skins start us off. Builder Hall 9 and the improved Legends League arrive in the middle. Town Hall 13, the Royal Champion and Yeti end the year.
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2020: Super Troops arrive in the game to give new powers and fantastic hair to classic Troops. Head Hunter, Log Launcher and the Invisibility Spell add even more options.
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2021: Town Hall 14 starts a rumble in the jungle. Heroes gain Pets for company and added attacking power! Dragon Rider and Flame Flinger heat things up.
TID_CHALLENGE_INFO_2022: Clan Capital is discovered above the clouds, letting Clans build and battle together! The first ten years are over but what will have changed in the next ten?
TID_CHALLENGE_NOT_AVAILABLE_IN_MODE: Return home to start a Friendly Challenge!
TID_CHALLENGE_NOT_AVAILABLE_IN_MODE_REPL: Return home to watch a replay!
TID_CHALLENGE_NOT_AVAILABLE_NO_ARMY: Reach Capital Hall level 2 to send Friendly District Challenges!
TID_CHALLENGE_NOT_AVAILABLE_RAID_SEASON: Friendly District Challenge not allowed during Raid Weekend!
TID_CHALLENGE_WAITING_TO_JOIN_LIVE: Watch a live replay to see how your friend is doing?
TID_CHALLENGE_WAIT_HEADER: Waiting for a clanmate to attack!
TID_CHANGE_NAME_ALREADY_USED: Can't change name! One-time name change has already been used on this account.
TID_CHARACTER_ELECTRO_TITAN_INFO: Barely controlling her raw magical power, the Electro Titan is a formidable force on the battlefield. She channels some of her magic into a powerful electro whip while the rest spills out to damage everything around her.
TID_CHARACTER_ICE_SPIRIT_INFO: For sub-zero snowballs these little guys have a surprising lack of chill. They'll hop off of Frosty and jump over to give the nearest defense a nasty case of frostbite.
TID_CHARACTER_INFERNO_DRAGON_INFO: Not getting upset over being alone anymore, the Inferno Dragon has learned to focus its rage into a very powerful beam that builds up over time!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_AD_SEEKER_FRAG: Thrust out in big numbers after a Lava Hound dies, these tiny creatures keep up the fight for a little while longer.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_AD_SEEKER_NO_EXPLOSIO: These fiery beasts are drawn to Air Defenses and are excellent at protecting other troops. Once destroyed, they spawn smaller, weaker menaces.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_AD_SEEKER_WITH_EXPLOS: These fiery beasts can't resist chasing after Air Defenses, providing excellent protection for other troops. Once destroyed, they erupt into many smaller, weaker menaces.
Distract Air Defenses with this flying tank.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_ARCHER: These sharpshooters like to keep their distance on the battlefield and in life. Nothing makes them happier than single-mindedly taking down their target.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BABY_DRAGON2: Cute, snuggly and prone to fire-spitting tantrums. Rampant destruction has never been so adorable.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BABY_ELECTRO_DRAGON: Baby Electro Dragon only chains to 3 targets and does not deal massive damage, but it is not slow.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BALLOON: These promoted skeletons have traded in their joy of destroying walls for a joy of destroying defenses. Deploy them to take out pesky mortars and cannons!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BALLOON_SHORT: These fragile fliers explode defenses from above.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BARBARIAN: This fearless warrior relies on his bulging muscles and striking mustache to wreak havoc in enemy villages. Release a horde of Barbarians and enjoy the mayhem!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BARBARIAN_SHORT: An iconic warrior who smashes defenses with his sword.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BAT: Bats are frightfully fast and deadly in big swarms, but are easily wiped out by splash damage.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BATTLERAM: Four Barbarians holding a big log race ahead to batter down their target, dealing big bonus damage if they connect; then they fight on with their swords!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BIG_BOY: Always around for his barrel of milk, Big Boy is undoubtedly the biggest skeleton anyone has ever seen. Don't let the looks fool you though, he's a total momma's boy.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BOMBER: With an appetite for destruction and high quality special effects, Bombers blow up anything in sight with bonus damage to Walls!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BOWLER: This big blue dude digs the simple things in life - Dark Elixir drinks and throwing rocks. His massive boulders bounce off of their target and hit again behind it for a double strike!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_BOWLER_SHORT: A big, blue dude who strikes with boulders.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_DARK_WITCH: Fearlessly summons flocks of flying creatures and, unlike her sister, leaves the grass in pristine condition.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_DRAGON: The might of the dragons is known throughout the land. This scaly terror of the skies feels no mercy and nothing will escape the fiery splashes of his breath.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_DRAGON_SHORT: Tough scales and ferocious flames are a deadly combo.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_ELITE_BARBARIAN: Superior in health, power, speed and most importantly, hair, the Super Barbarians are what regular Barbarians dream of becoming!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_ELITE_GIANT: Super Giants are bigger than their ordinary cousins and are great at punching their way through walls. The belt is from the annual village eating contest.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_ELITE_GOBLIN: Sneaky Goblins have a talent going unnoticed for a while after being deployed. It's usually the incredibly loud sound of resources being pilfered that gives them away.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_ELITE_WALLBREAKER: Who knew that rolling was so much superior to running? Super Wall Breakers use pre-ignited bombs that blow up under all circumstances! No more duds!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_EL_PRIMO: This mysterious masked fighter seemingly turned up out of nowhere, throwing punches that shatter walls with ease! No one knows his true identity, only that he's strong, he's a man and he brawls for your clan.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_FLYING_GOBLIN: Flying Menace to wreck havoc in the village. Hopefully at enemy village.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_GHOST: Upset that no one notices him, the Royal Ghost is determined to smash things up until he gets the recognition he deserves. He's so unnoticeable that even walls won't hold him back!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_GIANT: These big guys may seem calm, but show them a turret or cannon and you´ll see their fury unleashed! Slow yet durable, these warriors are best used to soak up hits.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_GIANT_SHORT: These big, tough guys just wanna smash defenses!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_GIANT_SKELETON: Big boned from early age, the Giant Skeleton was always destined to blow up more than just walls. His massive bomb damages everything around him after he is destroyed.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_GOBLIN: These pesky little creatures only have eyes for one thing: LOOT! They are faster than a Spring Trap, and their hunger for resources is limitless.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_GOBLIN_SHORT: Great at grabbing Gold and Elixir.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_GOLEM: The mighty Golem loves to soak up damage! When destroyed, it explodes and splits into Golemites. The resulting Golemites have one-fifth the Golem's strength and hitpoints.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_GOLEM_SEC: Golemites are smaller Golems constructed within the gargantuan creature. When the Golem is destroyed, the Golemites spring to life and keep fighting!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_GOLEM_SHORT: This boisterous boulder can endure massive damage.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HASTY_BALLOON: Retrofitted with two carefully safety-inspected booster rockets, the Rocket Balloon gets a flying start to every battle!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HEADHUNTER: Headhunter has just one job: taking out enemy heroes. As her other job, she works at the village apothecary. She's lightweight enough to jump over walls and her poisoned weapons make her targets move and attack slower.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HEADHUNTER_SHORT: Takes out enemy Heroes with prejudice!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HEALER: This majestic creature lives to protect and aid her fellow troops. Any army is improved with her healing support, but make sure to protect her from air defenses!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HEALER_SHORT: Keeps your army healthy and in the fight longer!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HOG_GLIDER: The real riders in the sky. They have a great track record in getting over walls, but are not very good at avoiding crashes.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HOG_RAIDERS: A beautiful reunion of Riders and Gliders, it's the Hog Raiding Party!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HOG_RIDER: Lose the Glider, and you are left with two original daredevils. This dynamic duo also has zero problems getting over walls.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HULK_BIG: When the tough keeps going, the going gets tough!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_HULK_SMALL: When the going gets tough, the tough keeps going!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_ICEGOLEM: The Ice Golem has a chilling personality and absolutely zero sense of humour. He frosts over everything he touches, freezes his surroundings when destroyed and ices up when talked to at a party. On defense his freeze effect is smaller and has a shorter duration.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_ICEGOLEM_SHORT: A walking icicle who freezes surroundings on falling.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_IRONFIST_GIANT: Heavy-handed and built like an ox, these Giants have been practicing their haymaker punch!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_LIGHTNINGDRAGON: Possessing iron-tough scales and a breath of devastating lightning, the Electro Dragon's favorite thing is raining destruction from above. When vanquished, the Electro Dragon even pummels the ground with lightning strikes!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_LIGHTNINGDRAGON_SHORT: Shock and awe from the skies.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_LUMBERJACK: Never goes anywhere without his Rage Bottle and never shares until he gets knocked out.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_MAGIC_ARCHER: Having achieved serious arm strength, the Super Archer can now threaten targets several buildings away.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_MINION: This terror of the skies was born out of Dark Elixir. Undetectable by the Seeking Air Mine, Minions materialize with ease, but are fragile in our world.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_MINION_HORDE: Six fast, unarmored flying attackers. Three's a crowd, six is a horde!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_MINION_SHORT: A relentless ranged nuisance who keeps attacking.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_MOVING_CANNON: A cannon on wheels?! Bet they won't see that coming! Tons of firepower, but not that sturdy!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_PARTY_WIZARD: The distant echo of a kick snare or high hat can only mean one thing; the Party Wizard is making his grand entrance. Dropping phat beats and massive fireballs, he's the soul of post-battle celebrations.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_PEKKA: Is P.E.K.K.A a knight? A samurai? A robot? No one knows! P.E.K.K.A´s armor absorbs even the mightiest of blows.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_PEKKA_SHORT: Massively armored with a mightily brutal sword.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_PUMPKIN_BARBARIAN: Who would've thought that pumpkins make for good makeshift armor? The pumpkin helmets provide these regular Barbarians some extra hitpoints until they get destroyed.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_RAGED_BARBARIAN: Why is he so angry, speedy and vicious? Nobody's brave enough to ask. Maybe it's because he can't find his sword?
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_RAID_CART: Another Cannon on wheels?! It might lack the element of surprise, but makes up for it with lots of bulk, added firepower and an escort of rowdy Barbarians!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_RAM_RIDER: Ram Rider is in a huge hurry to spread Clashmas cheer. After her first charge she'll keep jumping over walls to throw bells at defenses.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_RIDER: Having tamed the fierce leaping hog, the Hog Rider punishes those who hide behind their puny walls! Fueled by Dark Elixir, these warriors have never known defeat!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_RIDER_SHORT: Leaps over walls for up close hammer time with defenses.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_ROCKET_BALLOONS: When terrain is working against you, a swarm of Rocket Balloons can probably get the job done... if their boosters don't run out first.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SIEGE_MACHINE_CARRIER: The Siege Barracks parachutes down gracefully to first release a menagerie of P.E.K.K.As and Wizards and then the Clan Castle troops. How they all managed to squeeze inside is a mystery not really worth investigating.
Spawns Wizards and a P.E.K.K.A to do its dirty work.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SIEGE_MACHINE_CATAPUL: This little charmer flings bundles of Fire Spirits that both hit hard and leave behind a burning mess. Its long range helps it stay out of trouble, but beware of longer range defenses and traps! Immune to spell effects.
Burn bases down to the ground from afar.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SIEGE_MACHINE_FLYER: The Battle Blimp bypasses ground-based obstacles and delivers your Clan Castle troops directly into the heart of the enemy village, all while dropping bombs along the way. However, its thin hide makes it easier to shoot down. Immune to spell effects.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SIEGE_MACHINE_FLYER_S: Bombs its way straight to the Town Hall.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SIEGE_MACHINE_LOG_LAU: While Log Launcher certainly isn't the fastest or the sturdiest, it is definitely among the meanest. This trunk-throwing contraption pummels everything in front of it with endless logs to open up a path to the enemy Town Hall. Immune to spell effects.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SIEGE_MACHINE_RAM: The Wall Wrecker exists for two simple purposes: smash through anything that it comes across and deliver the Clan Castle troops straight to the heart of the village. Built from heavy duty materials, it can take a pummeling before breaking down. Immune to spell effects.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SIEGE_MACHINE_RAM_SHO: Breaks a path right through to the Town Hall.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SKELETON: This undead creature poses little threat by itself. But it never fights alone, since the Witch can summon an endless horde of Skeletons against your enemy!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SKELETON2: This undead creature poses little threat by itself. But it never fights alone, since the Drop Ship can throw an endless horde of Skeletons at your enemies!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SKELETON3: This undead creature poses little threat by itself. But it never fights alone, since there's a whole gang of them battling together!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SKELETON_BARREL: Is it a bird? Is it a plane? No, just Harry, Larry, Terry and a dozen friends, heading for the nearest building in a barrel of bones!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SKELETON_BARRELS: Did someone say Barrel Parade? It's a Skeleton party in the sky, until all the balloons pop... then it's a Skeleton party on the ground!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SKELETON_GLIDER: It's hard to get past Walls as a lowly Skeleton. But bones and gliders are light enough to easily soar over them!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SNEAKY_ARCHER: Cloaked under cover of moonlight, Archers can take out targets before ever being seen. Their weakness? Overconfidence.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SNEAKY_ARCHERS: A squad of stealthy Archers is a surefire way to take out important targets. Until they get revealed, that is.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SUPER_BARBARIANS: For any urgent pummeling needs, you can always rely on a gang of Super Barbarians. They're best fresh after being deployed, but maintain a good work ethic even after calming down.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SUPER_CHARGED_PEKKA: Unstable energy radiates from this powerful suit of dark armor, waiting to be unleashed!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SUPER_GIANTS: A pair of Super Giants are a true multi-tool: beefy, great at smashing defenses, but also talented at breaking through walls when needed!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SUPER_MINION: Super Minion's big forehead isn't just for show: sniping enemy defenses from a safe distance is simply a brainy move! Especially when you've grown too big to avoid Seeking Air Mines.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_SUPER_WIZARDS: Did you know a group of Super Wizards is called an \qego\q? Great at blasting away buildings placed close together, but not as tough as they'd like to think!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_TOXIC_MINION: Attacks targets from a distance, glows in the dark, and is a maniac on the dance floor.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_VALKYRIE: A master of the two-handed axe, this glorious warrior runs between nearby buildings and can shred several troops or buildings at once with her whirlwind blow!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_VALKYRIE_SHORT: This whirling warrior's axe reduces buildings to rubble.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_WALLBREAKER: Nothing warms a Wall Breaker's cold and undead heart like blowing up walls. A squad of them will make way for your ground units, and they will do it with a BANG!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_WALLBREAKER_SHORT: Helps the rest of your Army by blowing holes in Walls.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_WARLOCK: The Witch never fights alone, constantly raising dead warriors from past battles to lead her attacks. Upgraded Witches raise more skeletons at a time.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_WIZARD: The Wizard is a terrifying presence on the battlefield. Pair him up with some of his fellows and cast concentrated blasts of destruction on anything, land or sky!
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_WIZARD2: This Legendary wizard slows down enemy defenses with destructive shards of ice!\n\nOnly available for a limited time.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_WIZARD_SHORT: No wand needed for fireball after fireball.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_YETI: This heavy-hitting furry fellow digs cold weather and his Yetimite buddies. Hurt him, and you'll make the Yetimites real angry.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_YETIMITE: These little guys are super cuddly, but get very angsty when their big friend gets hurt. Hurt him enough, and they will swarm the nearest defense with a terrible purposefulness.
TID_CHARACTER_INFO_YETI_SHORT: A furry fellow with ferocious little friends.
TID_CHARACTER_MECHA_DRAGON_INFO: This aerial engine of destruction readily and frankly, quite excitedly lays waste to any defense it comes across. The skeleton onboard swears he's not touching the controls.
TID_CHARACTER_MECHA_DRAGON_INFO_SHORT: Just sturdy enough to last three minutes without exploding.
TID_CHARACTER_SIEGE_BATTLE_DRILL_INFO: A fine example of goblin ingenuity, the Battle Drill burrows underground towards the nearest defense. On arrival it pops up to stun and demolish with its dastardly drill.
TID_CHARACTER_SUPER_VALKYRIE_INFO: Not only are Super Valkyries superior to regular Valkyries in every way, they're also way more angry!
TID_CHARACTER_SUPER_WITCH_INFO: Focused magic creates focused results. Instead of summoning hordes of tiny skeletons, Super Witch summons just one really big skeleton with very formidable bone density.

TID_CHAT_RULES_WARNING: Misconduct may lead to your account being banned.
TID_CHAT_WELCOME:
Welcome to the global chat.

Please be respectful and polite towards others. Offensive behavior is not tolerated.

Do not share any private information (email, phone number, address, passwords)!

TID_COSMETIC_ESTATE_2X2_SMALL_CABIN_INFO: For the villagers who like their houses fair and square.
TID_COSMETIC_ESTATE_2X2_SMALL_HUT_INFO: A quaint little house. Not for tall people.
TID_COSMETIC_ESTATE_3X3_SLANTED_HOUSE_IN: The roof works well to keep snow from piling up, but makes interior decorating a pain.
TID_COSMETIC_ESTATE_3X3_THATCHED_HUT_INF: Occupied by Barbarians. Shoddy craftmanship. Highly flammable.
TID_COSMETIC_ESTATE_3X3_WOODEN_CABIN_INF: For the villagers who like their houses fair and square, and also bigger than their neighbors.
TID_COSMETIC_ESTATE_3X3_WOODEN_HOUSE_INF: A nicely built house. Great design. Provides shelter and comfort.
TID_COSMETIC_ESTATE_4X4_GIANTS_HOUSE_INF: Visitors can use the smaller entrance if the main doors prove too heavy.
TID_COSMETIC_ESTATE_4X4_LARGE_HOUSE_INFO: Spacious living quarters, good views and plenty of storage space.
TID_CRAFTING_RESOURCE_LOCKED: Reach <building> level <level> to unlock crafting using <resource>
TID_CREATE_CLAN_ARRANGED_WARS_INFO: Allow other clans to send you Friendly War challenges?
TID_CREATE_CLAN_PUBLISH_WAR_LOG: Allow other players to see the results of your War battles from your clan's clan profile
TID_CREATE_PRESET_INFO: Add troops and spells, then save the army
TID_CREATE_SKELETONS_SPELL_INFO: Summon an army of Skeletons anywhere on the battlefield!\n\nPut a few extra swords when and where you need them most. Skeletons do not trigger traps.
TID_CREATE_SKELETONS_SPELL_INFO_SHORT: Surprise defenses with a sudden Skeleton army.
TID_DAILY_LOOT_LIMIT_FULL_INFO: You have already won all available loot today. You can still battle for trophies!
TID_DAILY_TASK_1_DESC: Get a Star from a Multiplayer Battle.
TID_DAILY_TASK_2_DESC: Get a Star from a Versus Battle.
TID_DARK_ELIXIR_BARRACK_INFO: The Dark Barracks will open doors for creatures born out of Dark Elixir. Upgrade the barracks to unlock more troops with unique battle skills.
TID_DARK_ELIXIR_PUMP_INFO: Our Builders have finally figured a way to extract pure Dark Elixir, the rarest form of the magical substance.
TID_DARK_ELIXIR_STORAGE_INFO: The power of Dark Elixir could not be contained in a regularly shaped Elixir vat. As it's three times as powerful, we had to invent a cubical form of storage!
TID_DARK_TOWER_INFO: Set the Inferno Tower's Dark Elixir fueled flame to build up unbelievable damage to single targets, or to constantly roast multiple targets at once.
TID_DARK_TOWER_INFO_SHORT: Melt a single attacker or roast multiple!
TID_DECORATION_10YEAR_BIRTHDAY_STATUE_IN: Is it a bomb? 10th anniversary decoration? Townhall? No one knows!
TID_DECORATION_10_YEAR_FOUNTAIN_INFO: Celebrating the tenth anniversary of Supercell!
TID_DECORATION_8YEAR_BIRTHDAY_STATUE_INF: The Trader wishes you an especially delicious 8th birthday!
TID_DECORATION_9YEAR_BIRTHDAY_STATUE_INF: Is it a signal fire? 9th anniversary decoration? An elaborate barbecue grill? No one knows!
TID_DECORATION_CLASH_FEST_22_STATUE_INFO: Is this burning an eternal flame?
TID_DECORATION_CLASMAS_22_INFO: Take-off is easy, landing is hard.
TID_DECORATION_CLOCKWORK_STATUE_INFO: It's a bit shy, but if you watch closely you can sometimes see the cogs turning!
TID_DECORATION_GOLDEN_GOBLIN_INFO: Love of gold so True and Bold, it inspires goblins Young and Old!
TID_DECORATION_GOLDEN_HOG_INFO: It looks like gold, smells like gold, feels like gold. It's probably gold.
TID_DECORATION_LEAGUE_III_STATUE_INFO: Those who own this statue are truly powerful, on the verge of becoming Champions.
TID_DECORATION_LEAGUE_II_STATUE_INFO: A symbol of growing skill, the owners of this statue are becoming a force to be reckoned with.
TID_DECORATION_LEAGUE_I_STATUE_INFO: The owner of this statue has shown strength on the battlefield, yet has more to achieve.
TID_DECORATION_PIRATE_ANCHOR_INFO: After being cut loose and hitting rock bottom, this Anchor has just been enjoying its retirement. It's trying to stay ship-shape, but it's hard at this age.
TID_DECORATION_SNOWMAN_INFO: It has all the classic features of a snowman: gorgeous yellow hair, beady eyes and a frame of solid ice.
TID_DECORATION_SWORD_IN_STONE_INFO: A testament to strength, only the members of the greatest clans can obtain this legendary statue.
TID_DECORATION_WAR_SHIELD_INFO: To get this statue, you need to prove yourself useful in the Clan War Leagues. Earn those medals!
TID_DECO_CAP_REACHED: You've already built the maximum amount of these decorations.
TID_DECO_FIRST_BARBARIAN_INFO: An old statue from a time when tasteless haircuts were super popular.
TID_DECO_GOLDEN_BARBARIAN_INFO: Hair cannot get any shinier than this!
TID_DECO_GREAT_PYRE_INFO: Great for marshmallows and rousing songs about great battles.
TID_DECO_RESTORED_BARBARIAN_INFO: Brings cheer to the whole village!
TID_DECO_RESTORED_PILLAR_INFO: It has a fine print. So fine in fact, that it's VERY hard to read.
TID_DECO_RUINED_PILLAR_INFO: Worn by time, but still standing.
TID_DECO_RUIN_DESC: A set of decorations. Rebuild them if you wish to move them around or stash them.\n\nRebuildable from <building> Level <level>.
TID_DETAILS_TEXT_TH12_INFERNO_PACK: Townhall 12 Exclusive for a Limited Time Only!
TID_DEVICE_LINKED_MAIL_ITEM: New device was linked to your village.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_ALREADY_BOUND_TO_A: The current village has already been linked. The linking can be done only once.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_BOTH_HAVE_OPEN_ID: To play on multiple devices, please make sure you're logged into WeChat or QQ on this device.\n\nThen, log into WeChat or QQ with the other device. Your progress will be automatically synchronized.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_BOTH_HAVE_OPEN_ID_: The current village has already been linked. The linking can be done only once.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_CODE_CURRENT_VILLA: Your village is already permanently attached to the Game Center account you have logged in with.\n\nBecause the village already has progress (Town Hall level <level> or a purchase made), it cannot be overwritten anymore.

Your village is already permanently attached to the Google account you have signed in with.\n\nBecause the village already has progress (Town Hall level <level> or a purchase made), it cannot be overwritten anymore.

Your village is already permanently attached to the account you have signed in with.\n\nBecause the base already has progress (Town Hall level <level> or a purchase made), it cannot be overwritten anymore.

Your village is already permanently attached to the account you have signed in with.\n\nBecause the base already has progress (Town Hall level <level> or a purchase made), it cannot be overwritten anymore.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_CODE_ERROR_0: Something went wrong. Please try again!
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_CODE_ERROR_1: Something went wrong. Please try again!
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_CODE_ERROR_2: Something went wrong. Please try again!
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_CODE_SAME_PLATFORM:
You don't need to use the code link to play on multiple iOS devices.

To play on another iOS device, please make sure you are logged into Game Center with the other device. Then, on this device, log in with the same Game Center account.

Your progress will be automatically synchronized through your Game Center account.

You don't need to use the code link to play on multiple Android devices.

To play on another Android device, first make sure you're signed in with Google Play Sign-In on the other device. Then, on this device, use the Google Play Sign-In. (You can find the Google Play Sign-In from the game's settings.)

Your progress will be automatically synchronized.

You don't need to use the code link to play on multiple Android devices.

To play on another Android device, download Clash of Clans from the same Android App Store and sign-in using the same account.

Your progress will be automatically synchronized.
To play on another Android device, download Clash of Clans from the Tencent Store and sign-in using the same WeChat or QQ account.\n\nYour progress will be automatically synchronized.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_GAME_CENTER_ANDROI: Not signed in to Google Play
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_GAME_CENTER_TEXT: Please log into Game Center to perform the device link. Then try again.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_GAME_CENTER_TEXT_A: Please sign into Google Play to perform the device link. To do this, tap the Google Play Sign-In button in the settings screen. Then try again.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_INVALID_LINK_CODE_:
The code you entered is wrong, or it has expired. Carefully make sure you enter the code exactly as it is shown on the other device.

Please tap the back arrow to try again.

Note: A code can be used only once and it will expire in <time>. You can always get a new code by exiting and entering the Link screen again.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_NOT_ATTACHED:
Your village hasn't yet been attached to a Game Center account. Please make sure you're logged into a Game Center account with no existing village attached and restart the game.

You will be asked if you want to attach the current village to the Game Center account. Answer 'Yes'.

WARNING: Attaching a village is permanent and can not be changed later.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_NOT_ATTACHED_ANDRO: Your village hasn't yet been attached to a Google account. Go back to the settings screen and sign in with Google Play with no existing village attached.\n\nWARNING: Attaching a village is permanent and can not be changed later.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_OLD_DEVICE_NOT_ACT: To successfully link your devices, the old device needs to be active and displaying the link code screen.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_TIMEOUT_TEXT: The link code has expired. The code must be entered into the new device within <time>.\n\nYou can get a new code easily just by re-entering the link code screen.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_ERROR_TOO_MANY_DEVICES_T: You have already linked 10 devices, which is the maximum allowed.\n\nIf you want to remove some of the old devices, please contact us through the Help and Support page.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_SUCCESFULL_NEW: You have successfully linked this device to your account. To start playing, just tap OK and your account will be loaded. Have fun!
TID_DEVICE_LINK_SUCCESFULL_OLD: You have successfully linked the following device to your account:
TID_DEVICE_LINK_SUCCESFULL_OLD_NO_DEVICE: You have successfully linked a new device to your account!
TID_DEVICE_LINK_WRONG_ACCOUNT:
The current village is attached to a different Game Center account than the one you're logged into.

Please log out from the Game Center app and login again with the account attached to this village.

Then try linking again.
TID_DEVICE_LINK_WRONG_ACCOUNT_ANDROID:
The current village is attached to a different Google account than the one you're signed into.

Please sign out of the current Google account from the settings screen, and sign in with the account attached to this village.

Then try linking again.

TID_FAMILY_FRIENDLY_ENABLE_POPUP: Family Friendly Clans are designed to ensure the safety of players through stronger filtering in Chat. Please note that you can’t change this setting later.
TID_FAMILY_FRIENDLY_INFO: Family Friendly Clans are designed to ensure the safety of players through stronger filtering in Chat.
TID_FB_CONNECT_NOT_SAFE_TEXT: Connecting your village with Facebook allows you to be connected to your friends. To safeguard your progress and to play on multiple devices, please sign in to Game Center.
TID_FB_CONNECT_NOT_SAFE_TEXT_ANDROID: Connecting your village with Facebook allows you to be connected to your friends. To safeguard your progress and to play on multiple devices, please sign in to Google Play.
TID_FB_CONNECT_NOT_SAFE_TITLE: You're now logged in to Facebook
TID_FB_TRACKING_TEXT:
Facebook social features require \qClash of Clans\q to share your data with Facebook. Facebook uses this data for their own purposes, including advertising and tracking.

Allow If you want to share your data with Facebook and enable Facebook social features.

Ask App not to Track If you do not want to share your data with Facebook, which will remove Facebook social features from \qClash of Clans\q. Check out Supercell ID for privacy-friendly social features!
TID_FEATURE_BUILDER_BASE_DESC: Sail across the stormy sea for a new adventure in a mysterious land.
TID_FEATURE_CLANS_DESC: Join a Clan to chat with fellow players, send and receive Troop donations and much more!
TID_FEATURE_CLAN_CAPITAL_DESC: A mighty mountain fortress for your Clan to build together. Battle together against rivals for loot.
TID_FEATURE_CLAN_GAMES_DESC: Work together with your Clan to complete the Strongman's challenges and earn magical rewards
TID_FEATURE_CLAN_WARS_DESC: Work together with your Clan to beat rivals and show you're the best. The definitive Clash of Clans.
TID_FEATURE_DARK_ELIXIR_DESC: A purer, more powerful form of Elixir that allows building an even more powerful army!
TID_FEATURE_LABORATORY_DESC: Get the wizards inside the Laboratory to upgrade your Army to be even stronger!
TID_FEATURE_SEASON_CHALLENGES_DESC: Each month take on new challenges and earn awesome rewards!
TID_FEATURE_SPELLS_DESC: Brew up bottles of powerful magic in the Spell Factory. Use them to lead your army to victory.
TID_FEEDBACK_INFO5:
Please give us the following information about your lost village.
Exact name of village:
Town Hall level:
XP level:
Name of clan (if any):
TID_FIND_NEW_CLAN_PROMPT: It's pretty quiet in here. Maybe it's time to find a new Clan?
TID_FLAMER_INFO: Bathe foes with a fiery flood of scalding plasma! Both air and ground troops will feel the burn!
TID_FLYING_FORTRESS_ABILITY_INFO: Defends itself with Skeleton Gliders and releases <num2> angry Skeletons when defeated.
TID_FLYING_FORTRESS_INFO: You'd think putting wings on a castle would result in disaster, but those rules don't apply to Flying Fortress. With a payload of Skeleton Gliders, this aerial acropolis delivers punishing bombardments.
TID_FOLLOW_BUILDER_TEXT: The Builder's off on an adventure, and he took our Instagram password with him! Follow his travels and find out what he gets up to next!
TID_FREEZE_SPELL_INFO: When the going gets hot, stay frosty!\n\nThe Freeze Spell sends out a cryogenic blast that temporarily immobilizes enemy troops and disables defensive buildings within its radius.
TID_FREEZE_SPELL_INFO_SHORT: Freeze Defenses to escape the heat!
TID_FREE_NAME_CHANGE_INTRO_TEXT: You only get one free name change. Use it wisely as future name changes will cost you Gems.
TID_FRIENDLY_ARMY_INFO: Friendly Army is used when attacking in Friendly Challenges and Friendly Wars.
TID_FRIENDLY_CHALLENGE_SET_CASTLE_TROOPS: Use these Clan Castle troops in Friendly Challenge defenses?
TID_FRIEND_LIST_TEAMUP_2_FRIENDS: Follow your friends wherever they go!
TID_FULL_ARMY_REQUIRED_V2: You need a full army to attack!
TID_GAMECENTER_BOUND_TO_OTHER_ACCOUNT: Do you want to load Chief <name>'s village with Town Hall level <number>? Warning: progress in the current game will be lost.
TID_GAMES_GET_GEM_ALTERNATIVE_TEXT: Your Magic Item storage does not have enough room for this reward. Take <amount> Gems instead?
TID_GAMES_OVERVIEW_TEXT: Clan Games are all about completing Challenges and earning points together with your clanmates. The more points you earn as a clan, the better your rewards will be when the Games end. Be sure to involve your clanmates: the more people you have, the easier it will be to climb the reward tiers!
TID_GAMES_REWARDS_TEXT: When the Clan Games end, it's time to enjoy the rewards! Rewards come in several different tiers that get unlocked as your clan collects points from finished Challenges. Everyone who participated in the Clan Games by completing at least one Challenge will be eligible to pick one reward from each reward tier. Unclaimed rewards will be lost after 7 days.
TID_GAMES_TASKS_TEXT: Challenges are meant to test your strength in different areas. Completing a challenge within its time limit awards your clan points. Challenges vary in difficulty. If one of them appears too difficult for you, ask your clanmates to take it. Should you take on a Challenge you cannot finish, you can trash it. Note that you have to wait for a while after trashing before being able to take on a new Challenge.
TID_GAMES_TASK_REVIVE_CONFIRM_TEXT: Add <time> longer to complete this task? Your existing progress will be kept.
TID_GARG2_ABILITY_HELP: First <num> attacks are thrown from longer range
TID_GEAR_UP_ARCHER_TOWER: Install a switch that can lower this Archer Tower to shoot at a much faster pace!
TID_GEAR_UP_AVAILABLE_LATER: Upgrade this building to level <level> first!
TID_GEAR_UP_CANNON: Turn this Cannon into a Double Cannon that does much more damage in a smaller range!
TID_GEAR_UP_MORTAR: Turn this Mortar into a Multi Mortar that makes a bigger splash with burst fire!
TID_GEM_COMPENSATION_CLAN_GAMES: Hi Chief! We noticed that you lost your rewards from the last Clan Games. Unfortunately we are unable to give you the resources and Magic Items, so we have sent you 50 Gems per unlocked reward Tier instead. Our sincerest apologies for what happened. Clash on!
TID_GEM_MINE_INFO: Gem Mines access a rare deposit of this highly valuable resource! Mining gems is slow and hard work.
TID_GEM_POPUP_TEXT: You're out of gems. Go to the Shop to get some more!
TID_GIANT_CANNON_INFO: Nothing gets in the way of the Giant Cannon. Its mammoth-sized cannon balls push past anything and just keep going and going and going...
TID_GIFT_AVAILABLE_STREAM_TEXT: A Clan mate has sent Gifts!
TID_GIFT_CLAIM_FAILED_NOT_PART_OF_CLAN: Can't claim gift, you are not member of the clan!
TID_GIFT_CLAIM_FAILED_RECENTLY_CHANGED_C: Can't claim gift, you have changed clan too recently! Please try again in later.
Can't claim gift, you have changed clan too recently! Please try again in <time>
TID_GIFT_CLAIM_FAIL_SERVER: Failed to claim gift. Please try again later.
TID_GIFT_RECEIVED_INBOX_TEXT: You have successfully redeemed your promo code for bonus resources. The resources on the left have been added to your inventory.
TID_GOBLIN_SPEAKS_1: Gwaaarh! I'm not through with you yet.
TID_GOBLIN_SPEAKS_2: You may have beaten me once, but this goblin camp is a lot tougher.
TID_GOLD_MINE_INFO: The Gold Mine produces gold. Upgrade it to boost its production and gold storage capacity.
TID_GOLD_PASS_MAGIC_ITEMS_DETAILS: Magic Items are cool! But do you know what's more cool? MORE MAGIC ITEMS!\n\nUnlock a boatload of Magic Items with the Gold Pass. Check out full details in the reward track!
TID_GOLD_PASS_PERK_DETAILS: Build faster, train faster, research faster!\n\nPerks available through Gold Pass include:
TID_GOLD_PASS_PURCHASE_INFO: Buy this season's Gold Pass and you can unlock the above rewards and more!
TID_GOLD_PASS_PURCHASE_INFO_SCID: Get this season's Gold Pass and you can unlock the above rewards.
TID_GOLD_PASS_SALES_ENDED: The season is ending soon, activating Gold Pass is not possible. Please try again after the season has changed
TID_GOLD_PASS_SEASON_BANK_DETAILS:
Grow your Season Bank to get even fatter loot when the Season ends!

With Gold Pass the Season Bank can hold:
• Gold: <gold>
• Elixir: <elixir>
• Dark Elixir: <de>
TID_GOLD_PASS_SKIN_DETAILS: This Season's exclusive hero skin is <skin>!\n\nIf you haven't unlocked <hero> yet the skin will be available for you to use when you do.
TID_GOLD_STORAGE_INFO: All your precious gold is stored here. Don't let sneaky goblins anywhere near! Upgrade the storage to increase its capacity and durability against attack.
TID_GOOGLE_ACCOUNT_ALREADY_BOUND: Google Play Sign-In failed! Your Google account is already associated with another game account.
TID_GOOGLE_SERVICE_BOUND_TO_OTHER_ACCOUN: Do you want to load Chief <name>'s village with Town Hall level <number>? Warning: progress in the current game will be lost.
TID_GOOGLE_SERVICE_CONNECT_TEXT:
Chief!
<c2>Safeguard your progress now</c> by signing in using your Google Play account.

Afterward, <c2>you will always be able to restore your village on any Android device</c> whenever you sign in again using the same Google Play account.
TID_GRAND_WARDEN_INFO: The Grand Warden is a veteran tactician equipped with a magical Staff and a magical Tome. He toughens troops that attack enemy villages or guard your village.
TID_GRAND_WARDEN_INFO_SHORT: A master of magic who supports any army.
TID_GUARD_INFO: The best in offense and defense! Guard prevents attacks on your village while letting you attack others all you want. Only available while Shield is down.
TID_GUARD_NOT_AVAILABLE: Guard can't be bought while a Shield is active!
TID_GUARD_POST_INFO: Houses troops to aid in defense! These rabble rousers are sure to slow down the enemy.
TID_GUEST_LOGIN_IAP_BLOCKED: In accordance with the latest anti-addiction rules, you cannot make in-game purchases when logged in with a Guest account. To ensure the very best gaming experience, we highly recommend logging in with either QQ or WeChat and completing your real-name verification. If you have already logged in with a Guest account, you can connect your account to QQ or WeChat from the game Settings page.
TID_HAMMERJAM_OFFER1_MAGICITEMS_BUILDER_:
• <res0> Gold
• <booster1>x Builder Potion

• No storage limits!
• This offer can be purchased 5 times!

Get the most ouf of the Season of Upgrades with this amazing Hammer Jam offer!
TID_HAMMERJAM_OFFER2_MAGICITEMS_WALLRING:

• <booster2>x Rune of Elixir
• <booster3>x Rune of Gold
• <booster4>x Rune of Dark Elixir
