Get your upgrades going with this amazing Update pack!
TID_HASTE_INFO: Enrage your units to make them bigger, faster and stronger!\n\nCast this to create a Ring of Rage! Your units will gain speed and attack power while they are inside this ring.
TID_HASTE_INFO_SHORT: Enrages your army to make them faster and stronger!
TID_HASTY_BALLOON_ABILITY_HELP: Increases movement speed for the first <num> seconds
TID_HEALING_WAVE_INFO: Heal your troops to keep them in the fight!\n\nCast this spell to create a Ring of Healing. Your units will be healed while they are inside this ring.
TID_HEALING_WAVE_INFO_SHORT: Drop a quick health top-up wherever it's needed.
TID_HELP_TRAINING_PRESET_PREVIOUS_ARMY: Quick train the last army you used in battle!
TID_HELP_TRAINING_SPELLS_HELP_POPUP: You can brew extra spells and leave them here until your Army has free space.
TID_HELP_TRAINING_TROOPS_HELP_POPUP: You can train extra troops and leave them here until your Army has free space.\n\nNote: Your troops will train slower if a Barracks is under construction.
TID_HEROES_FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Heroes lead your army from the front and help guard your village against enemies.
TID_HERO_ABILITY_BARBARIAN_DESC: The king bursts into rage, recovering a large amount of health and getting a boost to his speed and attack power. A group of raged barbarians also appear to join in the brawl!
TID_HERO_ABILITY_COOLDOWN_ACTIVE: You need to wait before using the hero ability again!
TID_HERO_ABILITY_QUEEN_DESC: The queen vanishes from sight to recover some health and unleash devastating volleys of high-damage ammunition. Defenses will lose her as their target, and a group of archers will appear to distract them!
TID_HERO_ABILITY_ROYAL_CHAMPION_DESC: The Royal Champion throws her shield at the nearest defense dealing a blow that is certain to leave a dent. The shield then bounces onwards to nearby defenses, dishing out additional destruction.
TID_HERO_ABILITY_UNLOCK_PROMPT_FEMALE: Upgrade your hero to level <number> to unlock this ability!
TID_HERO_ABILITY_UNLOCK_PROMPT_MALE: Upgrade your hero to level <number> to unlock this ability!
TID_HERO_ABILITY_UNUSABLE_IN_RECALL: Deploy the recalled Hero to use the ability.
TID_HERO_ABILITY_UPGRADE_PROMPT_FEMALE: Upgrade your hero to level <number> to improve her ability!
TID_HERO_ABILITY_UPGRADE_PROMPT_MALE: Upgrade your hero to level <number> to improve his ability!
TID_HERO_ABILITY_USED: You have used the ability already!
TID_HERO_ABILITY_WARDEN_DESC: The warden unleashes the full power of his magical Tome, making himself and all nearby friendly units completely immune to damage for a short amount of time!
TID_HERO_ABILITY_WARMACHINE_DESC: The Battle Machine calls down an energizing bolt of lightning, recovering some health and making its next attacks do increased damage. After a time, this ability recharges and can be used again!
TID_HERO_AURA_WARDEN_DESC: The warden's staff radiates a health-boosting Aura that improves with every level. All nearby friendly units, on attack or defense, will gain increased hitpoints, but they will lose the boost if they stray too far away!
TID_HERO_BOOST_INFO: Add up to +<levels> to all Heroes. Temporary levels cannot exceed maximum level determined by Town Hall level.
TID_HERO_INSTRUCTIONS: This graceful huntress is a master of destructive force, though modest in health. She snipes targets in her territory when defending, and can summon stealth and terrifying damage when attacking once her Royal Cloak ability is unlocked!
TID_HERO_INSTRUCTIONS_BARBARIAN: This colossal menace soaks up huge amounts of damage and bashes anything in his path. He guards his territory fiercely when defending, and can launch into a devastating rage when attacking once his Iron Fist ability is unlocked!
TID_HERO_INSTRUCTIONS_QUEEN: This graceful huntress is a master of destructive force, though modest in health. She snipes targets in her territory when defending, and can summon stealth and terrifying damage when attacking once her Royal Cloak ability is unlocked!
TID_HERO_INSTRUCTIONS_ROYAL_CHAMPION: Over the wall and at them! The Royal Champion is only afraid of four things, and the enemy isn't one of them. She attacks with her spear at short range and throws her shield to take down defenses once her Seeking Shield ability is unlocked!
TID_HERO_INSTRUCTIONS_WARDEN: The warden follows groups of friendly troops and boosts them with his Life Aura. Attacking he can walk over walls or fly high. On defense he turns into a tower. Unlock his Eternal Tome ability to make nearby troops immune to damage!
TID_HERO_INSTRUCTIONS_WARMACHINE: The Master Builder's prize invention smashes enemy buildings to bits. What better way is there to show who's the best builder around? Unlock the Electric Hammer ability to give opponents a real pounding!
TID_HERO_ROYAL_CHAMPION_INFO: The Royal Champion is a hardened veteran of many battles, armed with fast reflexes and a fast mind. That is, she often attacks before thinking and gets herself into a pickle.
TID_HERO_ROYAL_CHAMPION_INFO_SHORT: A Hero always found at the heart of the action.
TID_HINT HEROES_DIE: Heroes are immortal, but they can be injured and must be healed before they can fight again.
TID_HINT HEROES_REGENERATE: Heal your hero by letting him sleep or by using the Heal button.
TID_HINT HEROES_USE: Your Hero can attack enemy villages or guard yours against enemy attacks.
TID_HINT HERO_ARCHER_QUEEN: The Archer Queen is an eagle-eyed warrior who wields a modified, miniature X-Bow.
TID_HINT HERO_BARBARIAN_KING: The Barbarian King is the strongest of them all. His consumption of Dark Elixir has made him grow bigger than Giants.
TID_HINT LEAGUE_DEMOTION: If you lose too many trophies, you can get demoted to a lower League. Fight for those trophies!
TID_HINT LEAGUE_PLACEMENT: If you have enough trophies, attacking any village will automatically place you in a League.
TID_HINT LEAGUE_PROMOTION: Earn more trophies to move up to a higher League level. Higher level Leagues give better Loot Bonuses!
TID_HINT LEAGUE_SHUFFLING: Each League Season lasts for one month.
TID_HINT LOOT_BONUS: Want more loot? Join a League and get a Loot Bonus for every successful attack!
TID_HINT TOURNAMENT: Clan tournament and troop donation counts reset every one month.
TID_HINT_ACCOUNT_SECURITY_1: Never give out your Supercell ID credentials to anyone.
TID_HINT_ACCOUNT_SECURITY_2: Supercell employees will never ask you for your Supercell ID credentials.
TID_HINT_ACHIEVEMENT_GEMS: Complete Achievements to earn free Green Gems!
TID_HINT_AIRGROUND_MINES: Mines and Mega Mines can be set to damage either ground or air troops.
TID_HINT_AIR_DEFENSE_TARGET: Air Defense's rockets only work against flying units
TID_HINT_AIR_MINE_MINION: Seeking Air Mines do not detect Minions
TID_HINT_ARCHER_TARGET: Archers attack anything in their range
TID_HINT_ARCHER_TOWER2: Lower an Archer Tower to double its stopping power in a smaller range.
TID_HINT_ARCHER_TOWER_TARGET: Archer Towers can target both air and ground units
TID_HINT_ARTILLERY: A small squad of troops can help prepare an attack before the Eagle Artillery will activate.
TID_HINT_ARTILLERY2: A quick strike can overwhelm the Eagle Artillery before it does much damage.
TID_HINT_ARTILLERY3: Eagle Artillery has a large no-fire zone around it. Be sure it covers your most valuable buildings!
TID_HINT_ARTILLERY_TARGET: The Eagle Artillery targets the toughest troops of the nearest or biggest group.
TID_HINT_ARTILLERY_TARGET2: A reticle appears where the Eagle Artillery's shots will land.
TID_HINT_ARTILLERY_TARGET3: Units near an artillery impact will take some shockwave damage.
TID_HINT_BALLOON_AIR: The Balloon is a flying unit, which means that Cannons and Mortars can't target it
TID_HINT_BALLOON_TARGET: Balloons primarily target enemy defenses like Cannons
TID_HINT_BARBARIAN_TARGET: Barbarians tend to attack the nearest thing, regardless of building type
TID_HINT_BATTLE_ENDS: The battle ends when you have expended all your troops, clan reinforcements and damaging spells.
TID_HINT_BATTLE_LOG: The Battle Log shows information about attacks against your village
TID_HINT_BOOST_RESOURCES: You can Boost the production rate of Gold Mines and Elixir Collectors with Gems once they are upgraded to level 5.
TID_HINT_BOOST_SPELLS: You can Boost the production rate of Spell Factory with Gems.
TID_HINT_BOOST_TRAINING: You can Boost the training speed of Barracks with Gems.
TID_HINT_BUY_TROOP_HOUSING: Upgrade your Army Camps to build a massive army!
TID_HINT_CAMP: Troops in the Camps are for attacking only - they won't defend your village
TID_HINT_CANNON_TARGET: Cannons can only shoot at ground units
TID_HINT_CANNON_UPGRADE_NOT_FUNCTIONING: Defensive buildings like Cannons can't shoot while they are being upgraded
TID_HINT_CHAT_REPORT: If you see an offensive message in the chat, tap it and choose \qReport\q to report the player.
TID_HINT_CHAT_REPORT_LIMIT: Use chat reporting only when necessary - don't get carried away!
TID_HINT_CLAN_CASTLE: Troops in the Clan Castle will defend your village
TID_HINT_CLAN_CHAT_PROFANITY_FILTER: You can activate a profanity filter for clan chat from the Settings menu.
TID_HINT_CLAN_GAMES: Sign your clan up for Clan Games to complete challenges and earn some nifty rewards together with your clanmates!
TID_HINT_CLAN_REINFORCEMENTS: Use the Clan Castle to request reinforcements from your Clanmates!
TID_HINT_CLAN_TROOP_DEPLOY: Clan Castle reinforcement troops can defend your village from an enemy attack, or you can deploy them when attacking
TID_HINT_CLAN_WAR: Join Clan Wars for exciting battles and extra loot!
TID_HINT_CLAN_WAR_LEAGUES_1: Serious about clan wars? Sign your clan up for Clan War Leagues and find how good your clan truly is!
TID_HINT_CLOCK_TOWER: Boost construction, resource production and everything else with the Clock Tower!
TID_HINT_CRUSHER: Crushers devastate ground troops, but flying or ranged troops can destroy them unharmed.
TID_HINT_DARK_ELIXIR_BUILDINGS: Dark Elixir can be stored and produced starting with Town Hall 7, along with Dark Elixir troops!
TID_HINT_DARK_ELIXIR_LOOT: You can start looting Dark Elixir as soon as you have built the storage for it.
TID_HINT_DARK_ELIXIR_USAGE: You can use Dark Elixir to summon the mightiest Heroes in the realm!
TID_HINT_DARK_SPELLS: Dark Spells can take less storage space than regular Spells, allowing you to take more of them!
TID_HINT_DEFENSE: Building good defenses is just as important as aggressive attacking
TID_HINT_DPS: The Damage statistic in unit and turret info is measured as Damage Per Second.
TID_HINT_DRAGON_AIR: The Dragon is a mighty flying unit that can attack both ground and air targets
TID_HINT_END_BATTLE: You can end a battle and be victorious when you have won at least one star in it.
TID_HINT_ENEMY_TOWN_HALL: Destroying an enemy's Town Hall always gives you one star
TID_HINT_FORUMS: Join the Clash of Clans Forums! Look in Settings - More.
TID_HINT_GEAR_UP: Look for a Gear Up option in your home village defenses to apply special upgrades from the Master Builder!
TID_HINT_GEM_MINE: Rebuild the Gem Mine to start collecting extra Gems!
TID_HINT_GIANT_DEPLOY: Giants can take a lot of damage. Deploy them first to draw the defenders' attention.
TID_HINT_GIANT_TARGET: Giants prefer to attack defensive structures like Cannons
TID_HINT_GOBLIN_DAMAGE: Goblins deal double damage to resource buildings
TID_HINT_GOBLIN_TARGET: Goblins are greedy for Gold and Elixir. Their favorite targets are resource buildings
TID_HINT_GUARD: An active Guard protects you from attacks and lets you freely attack others!
TID_HINT_GUARD_GAIN: You get some Guard each time a Shield runs out. This is a great time to attack!
TID_HINT_GUARD_GAIN_TIME: The higher your League, the more Guard you get whenever a Shield runs out!
TID_HINT_GUARD_LOSE: You can attack all you want without losing any of your active Guard
TID_HINT_HEALER_AIR: The Healer is a flying unit. Air Defenses and Archer Towers can shoot her down quickly
TID_HINT_HEALER_INFO: Healers can heal your ground units, but won't attack enemies
TID_HINT_HEROES_ABILITIES: Heroes have upgradable special abilities that unlock at level 5 and can be used while attacking.
TID_HINT_HERO_GRAND_WARDEN: The Grand Warden harnesses mysterious artifacts to make nearby troops tough as nails.
TID_HINT_HERO_GRAND_WARDEN_MODE: Using an flying army? Try setting the Grand Warden to air mode!
TID_HINT_INFERNO_TOWER_AMMO: The Inferno Tower burns Dark Elixir to power its flame. Be sure to keep it fully loaded!
TID_HINT_INFERNO_TOWER_TARGETS_1: The Inferno Tower can deal devastating damage to units it stays focused on.
TID_HINT_INFERNO_TOWER_TARGETS_2: The Inferno Tower damage rate resets to the minimum each time it switches targets.
TID_HINT_LABORATORY: You can upgrade your troops in the Laboratory to make them better and stronger!
TID_HINT_LABORATORY_UPGRADES: You can't cancel upgrades in the Laboratory once they are started. Plan ahead!
TID_HINT_LEAGUE_SHOP: League Shop offers some of the best rewards in existence, but you'll need to fight in the Clan War Leagues to get them!
TID_HINT_LEAGUE_SHUFFLING2: Each League Season lasts for one month.
TID_HINT_LOOT_CART: Collect Loot Carts to recover resources lost on defense.
TID_HINT_MORTAR_DAMAGE: Mortars deal splash damage to all ground units near the hit location
TID_HINT_MORTAR_TARGET: Mortars can only shoot at ground targets
TID_HINT_NAMECHANGE: You can't change the name of your village. Your villagers wouldn't know where they live!
TID_HINT_OBSTACLES: Clearing obstacles like rocks and trees sometimes rewards you with Gems
TID_HINT_PEKKA_INFO: Is P.E.K.K.A a knight? A samurai? A robot? No one knows!
TID_HINT_PEKKA_TRAP: The armor on P.E.K.K.A is so heavy that the Spring Trap does not work on her.
TID_HINT_PUSH_TRAP: Rotate Push Traps to toss troops in the direction you want.
TID_HINT_REBUILD_BOAT: Use the boat on your shores to access the Builder Base!
TID_HINT_REBUILD_CLANCASTLE: Rebuild the ruined Clan Castle to join forces with other players!
TID_HINT_REPLAY: You can watch Battle Replays from the Battle Log!
TID_HINT_RESOURCES_ARE_SAFE: Resources in your Builder Base can not be stolen by enemies.
TID_HINT_RESOURCE_LOSSES: Even if your village is completely destroyed, you always keep some of your Gold and Elixir
TID_HINT_RESOURCE_UPGRADE_NOT_FUNCTIONIN: Gold Mines and Elixir Collectors do not generate resources while they are being upgraded
TID_HINT_REVENGE_OF_REVENGE: Revenge attack is unavailable against players that you attacked first.
TID_HINT_ROYAL_CHAMPION: The Royal Champion can jump over walls to charge at enemy defenses!
TID_HINT_SAFEGUARD_PROGRESS: Sign in using your Supercell ID account to safeguard your progress.
TID_HINT_SCATTERSHOT: The Scattershot excels in dealing damage to troops behind the initial target.
TID_HINT_SHIELD: Taking a break from Clash of Clans? Buy a Shield to protect your trophies!
TID_HINT_SHIELD2: An active Shield protects you from attacks, though attacking others will shorten it.
TID_HINT_SHIELD_GAIN: You get a free Shield if an attacker destroys your village
TID_HINT_SHIELD_GAIN_TIME: You get a longer lasting Shield if your village takes a lot of damage
TID_HINT_SHIELD_LOSE: If you attack another player while you have an active Shield, you will lose a few hours of the Shield
TID_HINT_SHIELD_SINGLE_PLAYER: You can attack the Goblin Horde (play single player missions) without losing your active Shield
TID_HINT_SIEGE BARRACKS: Siege Barracks is great for starting your attack with and providing cover for the rest of your army!
TID_HINT_SINGLE_PLAYER_REWARDS: Need a bit more gold for an upgrade? Take it from the Goblins in a single player mission!
TID_HINT_SPELL_EARTHQUAKE1: Earthquake Spells can heavily punish tight groups of buildings with high hitpoints.
TID_HINT_SPELL_EARTHQUAKE2: Repeated Earthquake Spells deal less damage to the same buildings.
TID_HINT_SPELL_FREEZE: The Freeze Spell prevents buildings and troops from defending within its radius.
TID_HINT_SPELL_FREEZE_DURATION: Upgrade the Freeze Spell to disable defenses and troops for a longer time.
TID_HINT_SPELL_HEALING: The Healing Spell creates a ring of healing that heals your units while inside.
TID_HINT_SPELL_JUMP: The Jump Spell creates a temporary path over enemy walls for your troops to follow.
TID_HINT_SPELL_JUMP_2: Try using the Jump Spell to redirect melee troops who are busy attacking a wall!
TID_HINT_SPELL_JUMP_DURATION: Upgrade the Jump Spell to give your units more time to jump over walls.
TID_HINT_SPELL_LIGTHNING: The Lightning Spell damages units and buildings in a small area.
TID_HINT_SPELL_POISON_CLOUD1: Poison Spells are very effective against large groups of enemy skeletons.
TID_HINT_SPELL_POISON_CLOUD2: Your army will fight much more effectively against Clan Castle troops inside a Poison Spell.
TID_HINT_SPELL_RAGE: The Rage Spell creates a ring of rage that makes your units stronger and faster while inside.
TID_HINT_SPELL_SPEEDUP: Haste Spells are great on troops with high damage but low speed, like Balloons or P.E.K.K.A.
TID_HINT_STAR_BONUS: Earn a Star Bonus every day by winning multiplayer battles.
TID_HINT_STAR_BONUS_LEAGUE: Earn bigger Star Bonuses at higher Leagues!
TID_HINT_STORAGES_SPELL_IMMUNITY: All resource storages are immune to spell damage!
TID_HINT_SWAP_TROOPS: Want to change your strategy before attacking? Tap the green arrows to swap troops!
TID_HINT_TESLA_HIDDEN: The Hidden Tesla tower is hidden from attackers until they come close enough
TID_HINT_TESLA_TARGET: The Hidden Tesla can attack both air and ground units
TID_HINT_TH12_MAX_LEVEL_WEAPON: Beware of rushing a fully upgraded Town Hall 12 - it explodes when destroyed!
TID_HINT_TH12_WEAPON: Town Hall 12 has a weapon that activates when the building takes damage. Tread carefully!
TID_HINT_TOXIC_MINION: Deploy Beta Minions far from enemy buildings to utilize their Long Shot ability.
TID_HINT_TRADER: The Trader on the edge of your village has a weekly changing selection of magical goods. Watch out for his free giveaways!
TID_HINT_TRAPS_TARGET: Traps are hidden from the attackers until they get close enough
TID_HINT_TRAP_REPAIR: Traps and bombs need to be re-armed after they have been used
TID_HINT_TRAP_UPGRADING: Be sure to upgrade your traps to keep unwanted visitors off your lawn
TID_HINT_TREASURY: The Treasury protects Clan War and Star Bonus loot in the Clan Castle.
TID_HINT_TROOP_ABILITIES: Unlock and upgrade special abilities for your troops in the Star Laboratory.
TID_HINT_TROPHY_COUNT: Trophies that you win are deducted from your opponents' trophies!
TID_HINT_UNLOCKS: Upgrade your Town Hall to unlock new buildings and new upgrade levels for your current buildings
TID_HINT_UPGRADE_CANNONS: Upgrade your cannons to improve your defense against intruders
TID_HINT_UPGRADE_MINES: Out of gold? Try upgrading your gold mines
TID_HINT_UPGRADE_TROOPS: Improve your army! Build the Laboratory and upgrade your troops
TID_HINT_UPGRADE_WALLS: Upgrade your walls to slow down the enemy
TID_HINT_USABLE_WHILE_UPGRADING: Camps, Clan Castles and Storages remain functional while they are being upgraded.
TID_HINT_USE_SPELLS: Spells can have a huge effect on the outcome of the battle. Be sure to use them!
TID_HINT_VERSUS_BATTLE1: Earn more Stars to win a Versus Battle! Destruction percentage is the tiebreaker.
TID_HINT_VERSUS_BATTLE2: Win more Trophies to increase your Versus Battle rewards!
TID_HINT_VERSUS_BATTLE3: Win 3 Versus Battles a day to get a big loot bonus.
TID_HINT_VERSUS_BATTLE4: Having trouble winning Versus Battles? Watch replays and try to improve your defense!
TID_HINT_VILLAGE_EDIT_MODE: Easily reorganize your village with the Village Edit Mode
TID_HINT_WALLBREAKER_DAMAGE: Wall Breakers deal major damage to enemy walls, but blow up themselves in the process
TID_HINT_WALLBREAKER_TARGET: Wall Breakers blast holes into walls, opening a way to attack to enemy buildings.
TID_HINT_WARLOCK_INFO_1: The Witch's projectile attack may be weak, but her summoned skeletons can distract defenses relentlessly
TID_HINT_WARLOCK_INFO_2: The Witch is highly vulnerable when all of her skeletons have been destroyed
TID_HINT_WARMACHINE1: Rebuild the Battle Machine to use this powerful Hero in your attacks!
TID_HINT_WARMACHINE2: The Battle Machine's Electric Hammer ability can be used again after it recharges!
TID_HINT_WELCOME: Once upon a time in a clearing in a magical forest...
TID_HINT_WIZARD_INFO: Wizards can dish out high damage, but can't take much in return

TID_HINT_XBOW_AMMO: X-Bow uses Elixir as ammo. Remember to reload it after enemy attacks!

TID_LEGEND_ATTACK_CONFIRM_INFO: Be sure you are ready! Proceeding will use one of your remaining attacks.
TID_LEGEND_LEAGUE_INFO_TAB0_TEXT:
Legend League is where elite players battle to see who has the best attacks and base layouts. Each day everyone in Legend League has a fixed number of attacks and defenses. You can gain up to <num> trophies and cannot lose any when attacking. There is no searching time after pressing the Attack button.

If your trophy count is too low when a league day ends, you will drop from Legend League and return to the normal multiplayer system.

When you join Legend League you may get a reduced number of attacks and defenses for the first day.
TID_LEGEND_LEAGUE_INFO_TAB1_TEXT: In Legend League you can use a different layout for defending from the one other players see when they visit your base. You can change the layout and also defending Clan Castle troops in the Defense tab of the Attack menu. Defense settings will remain in use until you change them or drop out of the Legend League.\n\nDefenses can happen even while you are playing in your village. In Legend League you will not lose any resources from a defense and can still play while being attacked.
TID_LEGEND_LEAGUE_INFO_TAB2_TEXT: You don't get Shield or Guard when attacked in the Legend League. However, it's still possible to take a break by purchasing Shields. If your Shield is active when the league day changes you get to skip both attacking and defending for the next league day. It's not possible to purchase or remove Shield for the current league day, but only for the next day.\n\nIf you have purchased a Shield for the following day, but drop out of Legend League the Shield will remain effective in the normal multiplayer system.

TID_NEWS_ACCOUNT_TRANSFER_TEXT: Transfer your village now to a supported Android App Store to safeguard your village, get official player support, updates and more!
TID_NEWS_BD_GIFTS_TEXT: Happy 5th Clashiversary! Celebrate with your Clan Mates and get bonus gems for your Clan every time you purchase <c80d8e8>Gems + Clan Gifts</c>.
TID_NEWS_BIRTHDAY_TEXT: Clash of Clans is two years old! You can now boost all your resource collectors for ONE WEEK for only ONE GEM each until August 7th!
TID_NEWS_BOMB_TOWER_ARMY_REVAMP_TEXT: We've streamlined army training and made training effortless with Quick Train! Check out a short video on the new system!
TID_NEWS_BOMB_TOWER_MORE_TEXT:
• Friendly Wars: Challenge other Clans to custom wars
• Add Clash Friends from player profiles
• Clan Wars loot bonus and Clan XP rules updated
• Reduced time and cost for many upgrade levels
• Lots of balancing changes, from Witches to Wizards!
• New languages in Settings: Indonesian and Malay

Find out more in the full update release notes!
TID_NEWS_BOMB_TOWER_UPDATE_TEXT: • Bombard ground enemies with small, short-range bombs!\n• Bomb Towers explode when destroyed, punishing nearby melee troops!\n• Bomb Tower becomes available at Town Hall 8
TID_NEWS_BOMB_TOWER_UPGRADES_TEXT:
Town Hall 11
• Dragon level 6
• Baby Dragon level 5
• X-Bow level 5
• Mortar level 10
• Hidden Tesla level 9
• 25 additional Wall pieces

Town Hall 10
• Wizard level 7
• Baby Dragon level 4 now unlocked

Town Hall 9
• Wizard level 6 now unlocked
TID_NEWS_BUILDER_GONE: Um, has anyone seen the Builder?
TID_NEWS_CHALLENGE_BOOST_TEXT: Get ready for the update with a 1-Gem resource boost!
TID_NEWS_CHALLENGE_PREVIEW_TEXT: • Challenge clanmates to attack your Village at any time\n• Do Friendly Challenge attacks without losing your army\n• Share results, replays and even make Clan competitions
TID_NEWS_CLASHIVERSARY_TEXT: That´s right! It´s the Clash of Clans 5th Clashiversary! And to celebrate we´re filling the game with all sorts of special treats for players, including special new obstacles, offers, a one gem boost, and much much more to come!\nHere´s to five more years of building things up... and then blowing them apart!
TID_NEWS_CW_BD_GIFTS_TEXT: Celebrate the Clan Wars Anniversary! Get bonus gems for your Clan every time you purchase <c80d8e8>Gems + Clan Gifts</c>.
TID_NEWS_ECONOMY_TEXT:
• Training time and cost have been reduced for some troops
• Training time and cost have been reduced for some spells
• Training time and cost have been reduced for some troops and spells

• Training time has been reduced for some spells
* Training time has been reduced for some troops and spells
TID_NEWS_ECONOMY_TEXT3:
• Training cost has been reduced for some troops
• Training cost has been reduced for some spells

TID_NEWS_IOS7_TEXT: The next Clash of Clans update will remove support for all Apple devices running iOS versions 5 and 6. In order to keep playing Clash of Clans, please update to iOS 7 or higher. For more information, tap below!
TID_NEWS_IOS7_TITLE: End of support for devices running iOS 5 and 6
TID_NEWS_JUNE_V1_BALANCING_TEXT: • Upgrade Cannon, Archer Tower and Inferno Tower\n• Level up P.E.K.K.A, Healer, Wizard, Miner and Wall Breaker\n• Discounts and balancing, including new Town Hall 10 levels
TID_NEWS_MIRROR_TEXT: Preparation and perfect hair are the keys to a good battle. Find out how the Wizard gets ready for a fight.
TID_NEWS_RABBIT_TEXT: Fireballs aren´t the only trick the Wizard has up his sleeve. Find out what else he can do.
TID_NEWS_ROYALE_INFO: Clash Royale is a brand new, real-time, head-to-head battle game set in the Clash Universe.\nWelcome to the Arena!
TID_NEWS_SAFEGUARD_TEXT: Sign in to Game Center to safeguard your progress and to play on multiple iOS devices.
TID_NEWS_SAFEGUARD_TEXT_ANDROID: Use Google Play Sign-In to safeguard your progress and to play on multiple Android devices.
TID_NEWS_SEP_V2_BALANCING_TEXT: • Introducing two new units for your Builder Base: the Giant Cannon defense and the Drop Ship air troop.\n• Upgrade your troops to level 14 and your buildings to level 7.\n• The Battle Machine can be upgraded to level 15.
TID_NEWS_SPELLS_TEXT:
Lightning Spell
* Lightning Spell level 7 ravages buildings and troops alike
* Increased damage for Lightning Spell levels 5 and 6
* Lightning Spell bolts now strike closer together to miss less often

Poison Spell
* Troops in Poison Spells now take less damage at first, but much more over time
* Poison Spell damage now increases to huge amounts and lingers after leaving the spell
* Poison Spells now also reduce the attack rate of defending Troops

Earthquake Spell
* Earthquake Spells deal much more damage, regardless of a building's current hitpoints
* Repeated Earthquake Spells now deal diminishing damage to the same buildings
* Four Earthquake Spells will still always destroy any level of Wall!
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_ARTILLERY_TEXT: • This massive, long-range weapon obliterates poorly prepared attacking armies\n• Volleys of explosive shells clobber tough troops and wear down others near the blasts\n• Eagle Artillery only activates after many troops have been deployed, leaving the door open for tactical strikes and cunning multi-phase attacks!
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_GAMEPLAY_TEXT:
• Battle time limit has been increased by 30 seconds
• Goblins now target the Town Hall and Clan Castle for 2x damage
• Rearm costs for all traps have been massively reduced
• Reload costs for X-Bows have been massively reduced
• Large amounts of Healers now have reduced effectiveness on the same unit
• Army boosts have been reduced to 5 gems for 1 hour of boost
• Cost for finding a match and ‘Nexting´ reduced for TH10
• Clan War Preparation Day has been reduced to 23 hours
• Troop combat and pathfinding AI has been polished up and tightened
• Available loot percentage on Town Hall levels 6-10 has been slightly increased
• Villages one Town Hall level lower are now worth slightly less loot
• The playing field and troop deployment area have both been expanded (outlying obstacles have been automatically moved)
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_GUARD_TEXT:
• Guard protects you from attacks and lets you attack others all you want
• Get free Guard when Shields expire and play freely without worry of being attacked
• Higher Leagues grant more free Guard - Titan I & Legend players get 100% coverage!
• 2 hours of extra Guard is available in the Shop every day
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_HERO_TEXT: • Harness powerful new battlefield tactics by boosting and protecting your troops\n• The Grand Warden toughens all nearby troops and can make them temporarily invincible!\n• He jumps, he flies - fit the Grand Warden into any strategy and make your army shine
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_HERO_TITLE: Grand Warden: Your Army´s Newest Hero
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_LOOT_TEXT: • Town Halls now hold lots of available loot - destroy them in battle for a big payout!\n• League Bonuses are bigger than ever, but scale with your destruction percentage\n• Trophy offers get bigger and Trophy losses lower the higher your League!
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_OTHER_TEXT:
• Two new achievements have been added: Anti-Artillery and Sharing is Caring
• Troop/Spell donation interface has been revamped and now shows existing donations
• Troops in Barracks can now be queued in sequence, similarly to the Spell Factory
• The Clan War button now animates when a war attack starts
• Active Shield or Guard can now be manually dismissed by tapping on the icon
• You can now be offline a bit longer before being made vulnerable to attack
• A special sound plays when finding a multiplayer target after 10 seconds of searching
• A special sound plays when no multiplayer targets are found and a search is cancelled
• Personal Break online-time limit has been reduced to 3 hours
• Personal Break limit is now extended instead of reset in some cases
• Multiplayer matchmaking is less likely to offer opponents under your Town Hall level (only below Champion League)
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_OVERVIEW_TEXT:
• Town Hall 11 is bursting onto the scene! BOOM!
• Grand Warden & Eagle Artillery: The most powerful and strategic additions ever!
• New troop levels, defense levels, and Clan Spell donation
• Attack through Shield at any time, but be sure to protect your Town Hall!
• Guard your playtime when Shield is down and never get attacked off-guard again
• Goblins chasing Town Halls, bigger League Bonuses, Trophy offers, and much more!
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_OVERVIEW_TITLE: One of the Biggest Clash Updates - Ever!
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_SHIELDS_TEXT: • Town Hall destruction no longer grants a Shield - bring your Town Hall inside!\n• You can attack while shielded at any time for just a small Shield reduction\n• Get Shield at 30% destruction, more at 60%, but only when a sizable army attacks
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_SPELLS_TEXT: • Request reinforcement spells, not just troops, starting from Clan Castle level 4\n• Donated spells receive all existing Clan Perks benefits\n• Freeze Spell is now unlocked at Town Hall 9 and has slightly longer duration on lower levels
TID_NEWS_TH11_UPDATE_TH11_TEXT:
• Experience the biggest, baddest, most challenging Town Hall level ever: Town Hall 11!
• New Town Hall 11 hero Grand Warden can make armies nearly unstoppable!
• New Town Hall 11 defense Eagle Artillery delivers awe-inspiring devastation from afar
• More defenses, including an extra Cannon, Archer Tower, Wizard Tower and X-Bow!
• New Town Hall 11 levels for Minion, Witch, Wizard Tower and more!
TID_NEWS_TOS_UPDATE: We've updated our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy! Please take some time to peruse them (available in-game behind Settings). These important documents govern your relationship with our games, containing beneficial information for anyone who chooses to play. For more information, visit our forums.
TID_NEWS_TREASURY TEXT:
Daily Star Bonus
• Win 5 Stars from multiplayer battles to earn bonus loot
• Earn bigger bonuses at higher Leagues!
• A new Star Bonus is available every day!
• Star Bonus rewards are safeguarded in the Treasury

Loot Cart
• A broken down Loot Cart appears in your Village after every defense
• Collect this cart to recover some of your lost resources
• Only one Loot Cart will appear at a time, so collect it right away!

The Treasury
• Clan Castles now house a well-protected resource bank: the Treasury
• The Treasury safeguards bonus loot from Clan Wars and Star Bonuses
• It's the safest place to save up bonus loot until you are ready to spend it!

Balancing
• The Eagle Artillery now deals 3x damage to Golems and Golemites
• Second Air Defense unlocks now at Town Hall 6, third at Town Hall 7
TID_NEWS_TROOP_TEXT: This flying creature made of stone and lava can take loads of damage. It hunts Air Defenses and goes deep inside enemy village, providing cover to other troops. Once destroyed it erupts into smaller Lava Pups that will keep the fight going for a little while longer.
TID_NEWS_TROOP_TEXT2: This flying creature made of stone and lava can take loads of damage. It targets Air Defenses and goes deep inside enemy village, providing cover to other troops. Once destroyed it spawns smaller menaces that will distract the enemy defenses for a little while longer.
TID_NEWS_UPDATE_OTHER_TEXT:
* Freeze Spells now also affect defending air troops
* Lava Hounds can no longer target air troops
* Attacking troops will now engage defending troops from further away
* Titan III and Titan II Leagues can now buy 1 week shields from the Shop
TID_NEWS_UPDATE_TEXT: * Improved Lightning, Poison, Earthquake and Freeze spells!\n* Lightning Spell level 7 and 25 new Wall pieces have been added to Town Hall level 10\n* Total Destruction is now a Clan Wars tiebreaker - if the score is even at the end of the war, the Clan with more destruction percentage in their best attacks will be the victor!
TID_NEWS_UPDATE_TITLE: Spell Superiority and a Clan War Tiebreaker!
TID_NEWS_UPGRADE_OS_TEXT: Due to several technical reasons, we are unfortunately forced to end support for all iOS versions lower than 5.1.1 with Clash of Clan's next App Store update.\nSince your device is currently running on an iOS version lower than that, you will no longer be able to play Clash of Clans unless you update to the latest iOS version.\nFor more information on how to update your iOS using iTunes, please tap on More Info.

TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_DEPLOY_AIR_GRAND_WARDE: Now deploy your <c9916c8>Grand Warden</c>. Use flight mode!
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_FOUR_EARTHQUAKES: Four <ca9561f>Earthquake Spells</c> always destroy walls. Use them to open up the base!
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_GET_RID_OF_CC_WITH_POI: Use <ce98714>Poison Spell</c> to get rid of enemy Clan Castle units.
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_INFO_AIR_SWEEPER: Approach the base from behind the <cf70d16>Air Sweeper</c>.
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_JUMP_TO_CLOSED_COMPART: Use <c85ff3b>Jump Spell</c> to reach closed compartments!

TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_LOON_2: Deploy multiple groups to minimize splash damage from traps and <cf70d16>Wizard Towers</c>.
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_LOON_3: Focus on destroying defenses that attack air units first!
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_LOON_4: Destroy the last <cf70d16>Archer Tower</c> with your remaining <c54a0fe>Balloons</c>.
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_POISON_TO_SLOW_DOWN_QU: Use <ce98714>Poison Spell</c> to slow down <cf70d16>Enemy Queen</c>.

TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_RAGE_THE_HEALERS: Use a <cf07bf8>Rage Spell</c> to put your <c54a0fe>Healers</c> into overdrive.
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_RAGE_TOUGH_TARGETS: Using <cf07bf8>Rage Spells</c> will help you take down tough targets.
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_SPELLS_TO_CLEAN_UP: Use remaining spells to help with the clean up.

TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_TH10_BOBAT_RAGE: Use <cf07bf8>Rage Spell</c> to boost your <c9916c8>Archer Queen</c> and <c54a0fe>Wall Breakers</c>.
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_TH10_BOBAT_WALL_BREAKE: Break the Wall to reach <cf70d16>Wizard Tower</c>. <c54a0fe>Wall Breakers</c> deal more damage to Walls if they are under <cf07bf8>Rage Spell</c>!

TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_TH10_MINER_HEALS: Use Heal spells to keep <c54a0fe>Miners</c> alive when they are under heavy fire.
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_TH10_MINER_MINERS: Now your <c54a0fe>Miners</c> have a clear path around the base.

TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_TH10_MINER_WIZARDS2: Deploy some <c54a0fe>Wizards</c> to clear buildings from corners and sides to keep the <c54a0fe>Miners</c> focused.
TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_TH10_MINER_WIZARDS3: Deploy remaining <c54a0fe>Wizards</c> to ensure that <c54a0fe>Miners</c> stay inside the base.

TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_TH11_EDRAG_EDRAGS: Deploy remaining <c54a0fe>Electro Dragons</c> in a line.

TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_TH13_HYBRID_ROYAL_CHAM: Deploy <c9916c8>Royal Champion</c>. She is very powerful together with <c54a0fe>Hog Riders</c>.

TID_NPC_CHALLENGE_TH9_LAVALOON_ARCHER_QU: Deploy your <c9916c8>Archer Queen</c> to get rid of <cf70d16>Wizard Tower</c>, <cf70d16>Air Defense</c> and <cf70d16>Archer Tower</c>.

TID_PETS_FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Help your Heroes in attacks by giving them a mighty, magical companion!
TID_PET_ABILITY_INFO_BARKY: L.A.S.S.I can jump over walls to attack targets on the other side.
TID_PET_ABILITY_INFO_BULLDOZER: Mighty Yak deals extra damage to walls.
TID_PET_ABILITY_INFO_ELECTROWL: Electro Owl's attack bounces to a nearby target.
TID_PET_ABILITY_INFO_UNIPONY: Unicorn follows and heals the hero it is paired with.
TID_PET_ALREADY_AT_MAX_LEVEL: Pet is already at maximum level!
TID_PET_DESCRIPTION: Mighty companions for the mightiest heroes!
TID_PET_DIGGY_ABILITY_INFO: Mostly underground, Diggy comes up to stun and smash defenses.
TID_PET_DIGGY_INFO: Diggy is an introvert and spends a lot of time hiding underground. Still when it comes to battle he'll do his part, coming up to attack buildings and aid his Hero. If his Hero's taken out he'll seek out a new one for support and scritches.
TID_PET_FROSTY_ABILITY_INFO: Periodically spawns Frostmites against nearby defenses.
TID_PET_FROSTY_INFO: Frosty is the coolest pet... literally. Not only does his icy breath cause enemies to chill out, but he also releases swarms of Frostmites to further slow down defenses and help his Hero.
TID_PET_FROSTY_INFO_SHORT: Chills his enemies with his frosty friends.
TID_PET_HEALER_INFO: Unicorns have severe trust issues, but overcoming them with love and patience is totally worth it. They'll heal up any minor or major scrapes as well as any Healer!
TID_PET_HEALER_INFO_SHORT: Helps its Hero stay healthy and fighting fit.
TID_PET_MELEEJUMPER_INFO: The trustiest hound to ever roam the village proper, L.A.S.S.I chases enemies with unrelenting fury. Unless they fly, in which case she just observes them intently.
TID_PET_MELEEJUMPER_INFO_SHORT: A faithful hound who helps her Hero.
TID_PET_PHOENIX_ABILITY_INFO: Hatches to give her Hero a final moment of invulnerability before they are knocked out.
TID_PET_PHOENIX_INFO: A true friend will egg you on when things get rough. Phoenix starts the battle as a helpless egg, but at the moment her Hero might go down, she hatches. The furious fiery fowl then gives temporary invulnerability to its Hero and engages nearby enemies.
TID_PET_PHOENIX_INFO_SHORT: Hatches to keep her Hero going at their time of need!
TID_PET_POISON_LIZARD_ABILITY_INFO: Spits blobs of Poison at its enemies.
TID_PET_POISON_LIZARD_INFO: Always the fastest never the lastest, Poison Lizard spits slowing toxins at its foes. Is it actually a venom lizard? Possibly, but who's brave enough to correct it?
TID_PET_POISON_LIZARD_INFO_SHORT: An angry, toxic bodyguard who protects its Hero.
TID_PET_RANGEDATTACKER_INFO: Electro Owl zaps enemy defenses into dust from great distance. He's mostly made of feathers though, so better keep him well protected!
TID_PET_RANGEDATTACKER_INFO_SHORT: Supports his Hero from the sky with zap after zap.
TID_PET_SHOP_INFO: Every hero deserves a loyal companion. The Pet House allows you to unlock powerful Pets with various abilities to fight alongside your heroes.
TID_PET_SHOP_UPGRADING: Cannot start pet upgrade while Pet House is upgrading
TID_PET_WALLBUSTER_INFO: Built like a Siege Machine, the Mighty Yak has a knack for knocking down any walls it comes in contact with. It also flies into a rage if you knock out its companion.
TID_PET_WALLBUSTER_INFO_SHORT: Stubborn and especially fond of smashing walls!

TID_RAID_INFO_TAB_ATTACK: It takes multiple attacks to beat most Capital Districts. Damage inflicted by previous attackers lasts into future attacks. Spells also carry over into the next attack. As more damage is done the troop deployment area expands offering new options.\n\nTry out Raid Attacks in this Practice level!
TID_RAID_INFO_TAB_OVERVIEW: Raid Weekend is how your Clan proves itself against others. Your Clan will fight against a series of other Clans' Capitals. Defeat each one in turn to build greater rewards. Meanwhile other Clans will be attacking your Capital, you can watch how they're doing and adjust District layouts to shore up any weakpoints.\n\nEvery member of your Clan gets the same number of attacks to use across the weekend. The first time someone 3-stars a District they will earn a bonus attack. There's no way to get more attacks so make sure to use them wisely!
TID_RAID_INFO_TAB_REWARDS: Your Clan earns Raid Medals from both attacking and defending during Raid Weekends. Raid Medals are distributed at the end of the Raid Weekend to all attacking players. Each District destroyed by your Clan gives Raid Medals, the stronger the District the more medals. Raid Medals are also earned by how well your Capital does on defense against other Clans. So make sure to set up devious layouts to make your Districts as hard as possible to defeat.\n\nWhen attacking in Raids you can loot Capital Gold from destroying buildings.
TID_RAID_MEDALS_INFO: Raid Medals are earned by taking part in Clan Capital Raid Weekends. Use them in the Trader or to add Reinforcements to your Clan Castle.

TID_SHIELD_INFO: Long-lasting defense! Shields prevent attacks on your village, but remaining Shield time will go down if you attack. If you buy more than one Shield, their durations are added up.
TID_SHIELD_POPUP_GUARD_DESCRIPTION_1: Guard is the last bit of time before protection from attackers ends. You can attack others without penalty, but be careful - Guard doesn't last for long!
TID_SHIELD_POPUP_GUARD_TIP: Protection is ending soon. Be prepared!
TID_SHIELD_POPUP_NONE_DESCRIPTION_1: Without Shield or Guard, an attack might come at any moment. Defend the Town Hall at all costs! Traps, Heroes and Clan Castle troops will maximize the defense.
TID_SHIELD_POPUP_PERSONAL_BREAK: Note: Villagers will need a short break after being too long without Shield.
TID_SHIELD_POPUP_SHIELD_DESCRIPTION_1: Shields prevent attacks from others. Shields aren't affected by browsing targets in Multiplayer or Revenge, but they will shorten if you start an attack.
TID_SHIELD_POPUP_SHIELD_TIP: We're safe, for now. Relax or attack!

TID_SIEGES_FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Siege Machines are special weapons created in the Workshop that carry your Clan Castle troops.
TID_SIEGE_MACHINES_BATTLE_TEXT: Each Siege Machine specializes in a different way of delivering destruction. You can build multiple Siege Machines, that way you can choose which one you want to use at the start of the battle. Furthermore, if you prefer to not use your Siege Machine, you can still deploy your Clan Castle reinforcements the old fashioned way by toggling to the Clan Castle banner in the troop bar. Don´t forget to request Clan Castle troops from your Clan mates! Having an empty Clan Castle means your Siege Machines will be empty as well. There is no wrong choice in which Siege Machine you choose. Ultimately, it´s up to you to decide which one is the right one that complements your Clan Castle troop combination!
TID_SIEGE_MACHINES_OVERVIEW_TEXT: Siege Machines are a new and alternative way to deliver your Clan Castle reinforcements. Rather than deploying your Clan Castle troops from the periphery of the map, Siege Machines allow you to deliver them straight into the heart of the enemy´s village! The Siege Workshop allows you to build a Siege Machine for yourself or your Clan mates can donate one to you. Keep in mind your Clan Castle must be at least level 6 in order to fit a Siege Machine.
TID_SIEGE_MACHINE_BALLOON_INFO: The Stone Slammer is a heavy-duty, flying mountain that targets defensive buildings by flattening them with giant boulders and causes earthquakes. Immune to spell effects.
TID_SIEGE_MACHINE_BALLOON_INFO_SHORT: Break bases with big boulders from above.
TID_SIEGE_WORKSHOP_INFO: The Workshop is where Siege Machines are built. Upgrade the Workshop to unlock different Siege Machines!

TID_SUGGESTED_PLAYERS_ABOUT_TEXT:
Players suggested for your Clan are evaluated daily to be a good match on various factors. Only players who recently opted-in to find a new clan are shown.

Some factors are:
- Activity such as attacks, donations and chatting.
- Location, language and typical times playing the game.

Your Clan settings also influence recommendations. You won't see players who do not meet these criteria:
- Minimum Town Hall
- Minimum Trophy in Home Village and Builder Base
Changing Clan settings will not immediately change suggestions.

TID_SUPER_DRAGON_INFO: Sometimes having a fire inside of you isn't enough. The Super Dragon has fires on the inside, outside, and if he gets to do his thing, all around him!

TID_TENCENT_LOGIN_PROMPT_UNBLOCKED_QQ: In accordance with the latest anti-addiction rules, you will be unable to complete real-name verification when logged in with a Guest account, and your playtime is restricted to 1 hour every 15 days.\n\nYour game account has been previously registered with QQ. To ensure the very best gaming experience, we highly recommend logging in again with QQ and completing your real-name verification.
TID_TENCENT_LOGIN_PROMPT_UNBLOCKED_WECHA: In accordance with the latest anti-addiction rules, you will be unable to complete real-name verification when logged in with a Guest account, and your playtime is restricted to 1 hour every 15 days.\n\nYour game account has been previously registered with WeChat. To ensure the very best gaming experience, we highly recommend logging in again with WeChat and completing your real-name verification.

TID_TESLA_TOWER2_INFO: Part tower, part trap, completely shocking! Zap air and ground foes alike with the power of science!
TID_TESLA_TOWER_INFO: Lay a deadly trap with the Hidden Tesla! Our Wizards have trapped a storm cloud into each of these sneaky towers. When an enemy walks or flies close enough, the tower springs up and fries it using the power of Electrickery!
TID_TEST_PACK_RES_FOR_BOTH_VILLAGES: Test Pack for both v res from th
TID_THUPGRADE_COMPLETE_INFO: You have received the following boosts:
TID_TIP_SPELL_FORGE: Brew powerful spells that can be used when attacking
TID_TOO_MANY_ALLIANCE_CHAT_REPORTS_SENT: Please wait before sending another report
TID_TOO_MANY_REPORTS_SENT: Your daily reporting limit has been exceeded!
TID_TOO_MANY_SHOVELED_OBSTACLES: Reached the maximum number of shoveled Obstacles. Please clear a previously shoveled obstacle first.
TID_TOO_MANY_TRAINED_SUPER_TROOPS: You have too many types of Super Troop trained already.\n\nUse or remove those troops first.
TID_TOWN_HALL2_INFO:
Home of the Master Builder and the main objective in battle.

Destroying a Builder Hall awards an extra star in attacks. Win a Versus Battle by getting the most Stars, or dealing more damage if tied.

Upgrade the Builder Hall to unlock advanced buildings and troops!
TID_TOWN_HALL_11_INFO_SHORT: An elegant Town Hall for a more civilized age.
TID_TOWN_HALL_12_INFO_SHORT: A Town Hall that will literally shock you!
TID_TOWN_HALL_13_INFO_SHORT: A song of ice and Giga Inferno fire.
TID_TOWN_HALL_13_WEAPON_INFO: The Giga Inferno makes your enemies feel like marshmallows trying to mount an attack on a bonfire. When destroyed, it will blast the Town Hall to bits in a freezing explosion that slows everything around it for a time.
TID_TOWN_HALL_14_INFO_SHORT: Welcome to the jungle, we've got fun and games.
TID_TOWN_HALL_1_INFO_SHORT: The greatest of journeys starts here!
TID_TOWN_HALL_3_INFO_SHORT: Level up and team up to keep getting stronger.
TID_TOWN_HALL_4_INFO_SHORT: Look up to the sky and dream.
TID_TOWN_HALL_5_INFO_SHORT: Time for a little sprinkle of magic!
TID_TOWN_HALL_7_INFO_SHORT: An age of Heroism and Dark Elixir.
TID_TOWN_HALL_9_INFO_SHORT: More skulls, more skills, more fun!
TID_TOWN_HALL_INFO:
This is the heart of your village. Upgrading your Town Hall unlocks new defenses, buildings, traps and much more.
Destroying an opponent's Town Hall wins you the battle and you get one Star. Destroying 50% of enemy buildings gains you a second Star, while 100% annihilation awards full three Stars.
Beware, your enemies will be trying to destroy your Town Hall too!
For maximum protection, keep your Town Hall in the middle of your village and protect it with walls, traps and defensive buildings. Your enemies are sneaky and can attack from any side!
TID_TOWN_HALL_LEVEL_TOO_LOW: You need to upgrade your Town Hall to level <number>!
TID_TOWN_HALL_LEVEL_TOO_LOW_2: You need to upgrade your Builder Hall to level <number>!
TID_TOWN_HALL_UPGRADE_WARNING: Note: Upgrading will reduce your loot from opponents with town hall level <number> and below.
TID_TOWN_HALL_WEAPON_INFO: Your enemies are in for a big surprise with the Giga Tesla, the foul-tempered big brother of the Tesla family. When an enemy so much as scratches the paint on your Town Hall, sizzling Electrickery will blast them away leaving the air tasting faintly like coconut... and metal.
TID_TRADER_FEATURE_DESCRIPTION: Check out what magical goods Trader has in store each week!
TID_TRADER_GEM_OFFERS_UNLOCKS_TEXT: Gem Offers unlock at Town Hall Level <value>
TID_TRADER_TUESDAY_NOTIFICATION: It´s Trader Tuesday! Check out the new weekly Deals!
TID_TRADER_UNLOCKS_TEXT: Trader arrives at Town Hall Level <value>
TID_TRAINING_INFO: Tap and hold down unit icon to train multiple troops.
TID_TRAINING_INFO2: Drag units to train or reorder them
TID_TRAINING_LEVELS_DESCRIPTION: Hone your skills and try out different attack strategies for free! New practice levels become available as you upgrade your Town Hall.
TID_TRAINING_SPELLS_INFO: Spells become available at Town Hall level 5
TID_TRAINING_SPELLS_INFO_BUILD: Build Spell Factory to unlock spells!
TID_TRAIN_ALL_HOUSINGS_FULL_INFO: Upgrade or build Army Camps to house more troops, or send them to fight!
TID_TRAIN_SPELL_STORAGE_FULL_INFO: Upgrade the Spell Factory for more capacity
TID_TRAP_AIR_INFO: Latest invention in the field of flying pest control. This trap can blast multiple air units in a small area.
TID_TRAP_AIR_INFO_SHORT: Because air units also deserve an exploding surprise.
TID_TRAP_AIR_MEGA_INFO: Is it a bird? Is it a plane? Well it makes no difference as the Seeking Air Mine will blow it sky high. This trap does devastating damage to a single air unit.
TID_TRAP_AIR_MEGA_INFO_SHORT: Stalks flying attackers to give them an explosive greeting.
TID_TRAP_CAP_REACHED: You've already built the maximum amount of these traps.
TID_TRAP_EJECTOR_INFO: This bouncy little number will toss unwanted visitors right off your property!
TID_TRAP_FREEZE_INFO: Stops attackers in their tracks. Now that's cold!\n\nOnly usable for a limited time
TID_TRAP_HALLOWEENBOMB_INFO: Boo! This creepy bomb is available for a limited time only.
TID_TRAP_HALLOWEEN_SKEL_INFO: Ambush and distract unsuspecting foes with a surprise skirmish of short-lived, but sneaky skeleton troops! Skeleton Traps can be configured to pursue either ground or air troops.
TID_TRAP_HALLOWEEN_SKEL_INFO_SHORT: Annoy attackers while your defenses keep firing.
TID_TRAP_MINE_INFO: Nothing says 'STAY OUT' quite like a good old-fashioned hidden bomb.
TID_TRAP_MINE_INFO_SHORT: An unwelcome gift you can surprise attackers with.
TID_TRAP_RUIN_DESC: A set of long neglected traps just waiting to be rebuilt.\n\nRebuildable from <building> Level <level>.
TID_TRAP_SANTA_INFO: Leave a special surprise gift for your enemies. Your generosity will surely be rewarded!
TID_TRAP_SHRINK_INFO: This bottled curse from the Witch turns attackers mini-sized, temporarily reducing their hitpoints, damage and making them super cute. Harsh.
TID_TRAP_SUPERBOMB_INFO: When you're looking for a Big Boom, you need the Giant Bomb.
TID_TRAP_TORNADO_INFO: Wind and stones may break some bones, but this trap will definitely confound you. Just place one of these traps down and the released vortex will draw the enemy troops in, hindering their progress.
TID_TRAP_TORNADO_INFO_SHORT: Spin them right round baby right round!
TID_TREASURY_BOOSTERS_DESCRIPTION: Magic items have wonderful powers ranging from helping you with upgrades to boosting various things in your village and army. You can only hold a limited number of each item at once.
TID_TREASURY_BOOSTERS_EMPTY: You don't have any of this Magic Item!
TID_TREASURY_DESCRIPTION: Clan War and Star Bonus loot is greatly protected inside the Treasury. Increase Treasury capacity by upgrading the Town Hall and through Clan Perks.
TID_TROOP_ALREADY_AT_MAX_LEVEL: Unit is already at maximum level!
TID_TROOP_REQUEST_FAIL_COOLDOWN: You need to wait before requesting more reinforcements.
TID_TROOP_REQUEST_SPEED_UP_SUCCESS: Clan Castle ready for requesting reinforcements!
TID_TUTORIAL_ACHIEVEMENTS: If you're looking for new challenges to beat, just tap here.
TID_TUTORIAL_ACHIEVEMENTS2: Chief, you obviously know what you're doing. The whole village is counting on you!
TID_TUTORIAL_ARTO_COMPLETE_2: Don't let the size fool you. He swings a hammer like a champ.
TID_TUTORIAL_ARTO_COMPLETE_3: Well then! I'll pack some things. You can get a place ready for me to stay!
TID_TUTORIAL_ARTO_START_1: Hey! Remember when you first got here? I said that I'd like to visit your home.
TID_TUTORIAL_ARTO_START_2: So, uh... I've made plans to go for a visit. Or stay a while. Or maybe just stay.
TID_TUTORIAL_ARTO_START_3: I won't leave you hanging! I'm making someone that can replace me while I'm away!
TID_TUTORIAL_ATTACK: Really? If you can battle as well as you clean, we might make a good team!
TID_TUTORIAL_ATTACK_DONE: Oh no, they're attacking us, too!?
TID_TUTORIAL_ATTACK_DONE2: That's how we settle things! Best attack wins the prize. No stealing - that's RUDE.
TID_TUTORIAL_ATTACK_DONE3: Chief, you did the best attack! We got loot as a prize!
TID_TUTORIAL_ATTACK_NPC_1: The Wizards from Ivory Tower are here to help us! Let's take out the goblin camp!
TID_TUTORIAL_ATTACK_NPC_2: Well done. Now let's kick some green butt!
TID_TUTORIAL_BARRACK_1: Chief, we need an army to fight those goblins! Let's build a Barracks.
TID_TUTORIAL_BATTLE_BUILDERS_1: Hey Chief, the Builders say they want to do more in battles.
TID_TUTORIAL_BATTLE_BUILDERS_2: Upgrade their huts to see how they can help!
TID_TUTORIAL_BUILDER_MENU: Here you can find suggestions for what to build or upgrade next!
TID_TUTORIAL_CANNON_1: Welcome Chief! We have been waiting for you...
TID_TUTORIAL_CANNON_2: This is our new village! Life here would be perfect if it wasn't for....
TID_TUTORIAL_CANNON_3: Oh no, GOBLINS! Quickly, set up a Cannon to defend the village!
TID_TUTORIAL_CANNON_4: Place the Cannon in the village. We must protect the Town Hall!
TID_TUTORIAL_CANNON_5: Chief, you can spend some Gems to speed things up!
TID_TUTORIAL_CAPITAL_ARMY_1: When you attack here you use your own Capital´s troops and spells.
TID_TUTORIAL_CAPITAL_ARMY_2: I don´t have time to ferry troops back and forth when you change your mind.
TID_TUTORIAL_CAPITAL_ARMY_3: Your army is always ready to fight here, when you finally decide what to use.
TID_TUTORIAL_CAPITAL_ARMY_4: Unlock and upgrade Troop Barracks and Spell Factories if you want more choices or a stronger army.
TID_TUTORIAL_CAPITAL_UPGRADE_1: Hmmm. This could be much better. Let´s upgrade it!
TID_TUTORIAL_CAPITAL_UPGRADE_2: In Capital your whole Clan upgrades buildings together. Every member can chip in and contribute Capital Gold.
TID_TUTORIAL_CAPITAL_UPGRADE_3: When enough has been contributed, the upgrade will be completed.
TID_TUTORIAL_CAPITAL_UPGRADE_4: I only need one good swing of my hammer to get things done, unlike some people...
TID_TUTORIAL_CHANGE_NAME: That was a great battle! How shall you be known in our history?
TID_TUTORIAL_CHECK_PARENTAL_CONSENT: Chief, before you can play we'll need to get a trusted adult's approval.
TID_TUTORIAL_CLANCASTLE_1: Chief, our storages are flush with gold. Let's repair the Clan Castle!
TID_TUTORIAL_CLANCASTLE_2: Tap the Clan Castle and rebuild it!
TID_TUTORIAL_CLANGAMES_1: Hello there, chief! Glad you're here!
TID_TUTORIAL_CLANGAMES_2: Ready for a little contest? Come inside and see if you are!
TID_TUTORIAL_DEFEND_1b: Gwahaah, what is this? Another puny human!
TID_TUTORIAL_DEFEND_2: Phew, that was a close call. Thanks Chief!
TID_TUTORIAL_DEFEND_4: The village is built on a Ley Line. The buildings will magically repair themselves!
TID_TUTORIAL_DEFEND_5: Gwarh, GOLD! We goblins love gold!
TID_TUTORIAL_ELIXIRSTORAGE: That Elixir needs a place to store it as well.
TID_TUTORIAL_ELIXIR_1: Elixir is used to construct and upgrade Buildings.
TID_TUTORIAL_ELIXIR_2: You can pump Elixir from underground. Let's try it!
TID_TUTORIAL_ELIXIR_STORAGE_1: The collector can only store a small amount of Elixir.
TID_TUTORIAL_ELIXIR_STORAGE_2: Let's build an Elixir Storage so we can stockpile the stuff!
TID_TUTORIAL_FAILED: Oops, something went wrong. Restart and try again!
TID_TUTORIAL_FORGE_1: The Grand Builder sent this Forge over. He says it'll help with the Capital.
TID_TUTORIAL_FORGE_2: Each day it will make some Capital Gold. You can collect it by tapping here.
TID_TUTORIAL_FORGE_3: I asked how it worked but he said we wouldn't understand.
TID_TUTORIAL_FORGE_CRAFTING_1: Builders can also craft existing resources into Capital Gold.
TID_TUTORIAL_FORGE_CRAFTING_2: It´ll take some time, but can help build up your Capital faster!
TID_TUTORIAL_GOLDSTORAGE: You also need a place to store all your precious Gold!
TID_TUTORIAL_GOLD_STORAGE_1: We also need a safe place to store our Gold reserves.
TID_TUTORIAL_GOLD_STORAGE_2: Build a Gold Storage so we can stockpile more gold!
TID_TUTORIAL_LOOK_FINISH: Using troops? Chief, your skills might come in handy here!
TID_TUTORIAL_LOOK_LABORATORY: I'm a Master Builder. Wanna see my favorite building? It gives troops special abilities!
TID_TUTORIAL_LOOK_LABORATORY_DO: We need troops to see who's the best Builder around, of course!
TID_TUTORIAL_MAGICITEMS_1: Chief, we found a strange item in the Clan Castle!
TID_TUTORIAL_MAGICITEMS_2: Is it dangerous? It's glowing with great power!
TID_TUTORIAL_MEET_NEW_BUILDER3: Whoa! Where did you come from?!
TID_TUTORIAL_MEET_NEW_BUILDER4: My place! You... completely cleaned it! You TOTALLY earned yourself a tour.
TID_TUTORIAL_MODE_TEXT: Rewards are not available in Tutorial Mode
TID_TUTORIAL_OWN_HOUSE_1: This is your home away from the Home Village. It has a much better view!
TID_TUTORIAL_OWN_HOUSE_2: You look like you really like brown, so I've decorated it that way.
TID_TUTORIAL_OWN_HOUSE_3: Well if you don't like it, you can change it yourself here!
TID_TUTORIAL_OWN_HOUSE_4: There's a few options already and the more Capital Gold you contribute, the more you'll unlock!
TID_TUTORIAL_PETS_2: Pets are powerful companions that fight alongside your heroes in battle.
TID_TUTORIAL_PETS_3: You can upgrade them to make them even more powerful.
TID_TUTORIAL_PETS_4: Let's pair up the first one, L.A.S.S.I, with one of your heroes!
TID_TUTORIAL_PETS_5: Excellent choice! Each pet is unique and there's many great combinations.
TID_TUTORIAL_PETS_6: Feel free to experiment to see what works best!
TID_TUTORIAL_PET_SHOP: Hey Chief! Let me offer you a tour of the Pet House!
TID_TUTORIAL_RAID_TEASER_1: You young people want to do everything all the time.
TID_TUTORIAL_RAID_TEASER_2: When the time is right your Clan can take part in Raid Weekends.
TID_TUTORIAL_RAID_TEASER_3: Have a little patience. Practice your attacks and build stronger defenses!
TID_TUTORIAL_RAID_WEEKEND_1: Ah, it´s time for raiding! In Raid Weekends you go up against other Clans´ Capitals.
TID_TUTORIAL_RAID_WEEKEND_2: Here you see the enemy Clan you are currently raiding. To win, your Clan needs to wipe out all their districts.
TID_TUTORIAL_RAID_WEEKEND_3: When you beat this Capital you will be matched against another one. You´ll keep getting new opponents until the weekend ends!
TID_TUTORIAL_RAID_WEEKEND_4: Everyone gets a number of attacks they can use. First time you 3-star a district you´ll get a bonus attack.
TID_TUTORIAL_RAID_WEEKEND_5: Meanwhile other Clans are attacking our Capital. I did say we should have upgraded more of those defenses...
TID_TUTORIAL_RAID_WEEKEND_6: When the weekend finishes you will earn Raid Medals based on how well your Clan did in attacking and defending.
TID_TUTORIAL_RUINS_1: Hmph. Seems like things have fallen into disrepair...
TID_TUTORIAL_RUINS_2: Rebuild these ruins and you´ll get new buildings in this District.
TID_TUTORIAL_RUINS_3: You can see what you´ll get and how much Capital Gold is needed here.
TID_TUTORIAL_RUINS_4: More buildings means more options for good defenses and strong attacks.
TID_TUTORIAL_SEASON_CHALLENGE_1: Hey Chief! I felt that you're ready for something new.
TID_TUTORIAL_SEASON_CHALLENGE_2: From now on, there will be new challenges and rewards available every month!
TID_TUTORIAL_SEASON_CHALLENGE_3: There are also new rewards called perks. Let's take a look!
TID_TUTORIAL_SEASON_CHALLENGE_4: The Season Bank magically fills up as you get loot from regular battles.
TID_TUTORIAL_SEASON_CHALLENGE_5: At the end of each month, all of it will be deposited to your storages!
TID_TUTORIAL_SEASON_CHALLENGE_6: The other perks help with building, research, training and donation costs.
TID_TUTORIAL_SEASON_CHALLENGE_7: Get the Gold Pass and earn all of the perks along with other great rewards!
TID_TUTORIAL_SELF_DONATING_1: Chief, those Raid Medals you got from the Capital can be used here.
TID_TUTORIAL_SELF_DONATING_2: You can use them to fill up your Clan Castle with whatever you want.
TID_TUTORIAL_SELF_DONATING_3: Should come in handy when the rest of the Clan are asleep.
TID_TUTORIAL_SHIP: Chief, we can now rebuild the shipwreck on our shores!
TID_TUTORIAL_SHIP_ARRIVE: Land ho! What is this strange place?
TID_TUTORIAL_SHIP_ARRIVE_FIX_VILLAGE: We're in luck, Chief! We can fix up those old buildings for shelter!
TID_TUTORIAL_SHIP_LOAD_SHIP: Chief, our boat and crew are ready to set sail!
TID_TUTORIAL_SHIP_READY: Don't worry about getting lost. We'll remember the way back!
TID_TUTORIAL_STARTER_CHALLENGE_1: I've set up some challenges for you to tackle!
TID_TUTORIAL_STARTER_CHALLENGE_2: Completing each challenge earns you points.
TID_TUTORIAL_STARTER_CHALLENGE_2A: Sometimes you'll also unlock new challenges too.
TID_TUTORIAL_STARTER_CHALLENGE_3: Earn enough points, and you'll win rewards!
TID_TUTORIAL_STARTER_CHALLENGE_4: Here you can see how many points you need for each reward.
TID_TUTORIAL_STARTER_CHALLENGE_5: These will help our village get stronger and stronger!
TID_TUTORIAL_STARTER_CHALLENGE_6: Good luck Chief! You've got this!
TID_TUTORIAL_TH12_1: Your Town Hall now fires back at attackers!
TID_TUTORIAL_TH12_2: You can upgrade the weapon to make it more powerful.
TID_TUTORIAL_TOWN_HALL_1: With the Gold we took from the goblins, we can afford to upgrade the Town Hall.
TID_TUTORIAL_TOWN_HALL_2: Good job! We can now build new buildings from the Shop thanks to the Town Hall upgrade.
TID_TUTORIAL_TRAIN_2: Tap the Barracks and choose Train Troops
TID_TUTORIAL_VILLAGERS_MOVE_OUT: Phew! Let's settle here for tonight. It's our home away from home!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_BATTLE_1: On battle day we attack! Trophies and Shields don't count here, only victory!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_DONATE_1: On preparation day we donate troops and scout our enemies.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_INFO_1: Tap the info button to learn more. The clan is counting on you, Chief!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_1: We made it, Chief! We made it to the War Leagues!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_10: Here you can see how we are doing against the other clans.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_11: The clan that has collected most stars overall wins the entire league.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_12: If we win, we can climb to higher and higher leagues!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_13: Tap the info button for more information. I think we are ready!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_14: Oh, one important thing! We earn League Medals from stars and wins.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_15: We can use them to buy some very powerful items.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_16: When you're ready, go use them in the Shop!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_2: Here we can finally show that we are one of the greatest clans!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_3: Let's get prepared. I can tell you a thing or two to help us get ready!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_4: First, we will be fighting one battle after another.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_5: At the bottom, you can tap buttons to move between wars!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_6: Make sure you donate troops for the next day in advance, Chief!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_7: To win a day, we need to collect more stars than the opponent.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_8: Each clan member can do just one attack, so let's make them count!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_LEAGUE_9: Let's look at the big picture. Tap on the button below.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_MAP_ENEMY_1: Oh my, the enemy War Bases are everywhere!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_MAP_ENEMY_2: Attacks are limited out here, so we'll need our clan to fight them all.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_MAP_ENEMY_3: Take a look around, Chief, then let's check back on our War Bases.
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_MAP_FRIENDLY_1: You've finally arrived, Chief! Welcome to the War Zone!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_MAP_FRIENDLY_2: Our enemies are hungry for war, but our clan is here and ready to fight!
TID_TUTORIAL_WAR_MAP_FRIENDLY_3: Look, Chief, over there! I've spotted the enemy clan!
TID_TUTORIAL_WORKER_1: Wow, nice going! Now we need to get this village into fighting shape.
TID_TUTORIAL_WORKER_2: Hiring a second builder will let you start two constructions simultaneously.
TID_TUTORIAL_WORKER_MENU: Hooray! I have SO many ideas of things to build. Just look at my wish list!
TID_TUTORIAL_WORKER_MENU2: I always have ideas here. But you really know your stuff. You should choose!
TID_TUTORIAL_WORKER_MENU3: Awesome! We're a team now! Maybe I can even visit your home some day and... Zzz...
TID_TUTORIAL_WORKER_MENU4: Chief, seems there is plenty to do here. Let's be sure to look after our village too!
TID_TYPE_ACCEPT_CLAN_INVITE_WHILE_IN_CLA: You will leave your current clan if you accept this clan invite. Are you sure?
TID_UNABLE_TO_LOCATE_COUNTRY_FOR_CLAN_SC: Unable to display top scores for your clan location
TID_UNABLE_TO_LOCATE_COUNTRY_FOR_SCORES: Unable to find local leaderboards for your location.
TID_UNABLE_TO_WATCH: Player is not currently in a battle.

TID_WL_INFO_LIVE_TAB0_TEXT:
<cFCE27F>What is the Battle Week? </c>

During each battle week, your clan will be grouped with seven other clans from your league tier. Over the next seven days, your clan will war with each of the other clans to determine who's the best in your group! Clans that do well can get promoted to the next higher league tier while the bottom performing clans will get dropped to the next tier below your current one.

When a battle week starts, your clan will first enter into preparation period for your first war day. During the preparation day you can choose the participants for the next war from everyone who signed up. After 24 hours have passed, the first war day will begin. Simultaneously, preparations for the second war day will also begin!
TID_WL_INFO_LIVE_TAB1_TEXT: <cFCE27F>How is the leaderboard ranked?</c>\n\nYou can check where your Clan currently stands in comparison to the 7 other Clans in your League group by viewing the Leaderboard. The Leaderboard displays the status of your Clan's performance throughout the Battle Week and is based on the total number of Stars earned. Your clan earns an additional 10 Stars for each won war. The more Stars you earn, the higher your Clan will rank!
TID_WL_INFO_LIVE_TAB2_TEXT: Your reward limit depends on your clan´s league level and position at the end of the season. You earn at least 20% of the rewards and 10% more for each obtained star. For 8 or more stars you earn the full reward.
TID_WL_INFO_SIGNUP_TAB0_TEXT: <cFCE27F>What are Clan War Leagues?</c>\n\nClan War Leagues is the ultimate contest for clans. It is a monthly league that puts your clan against seven others to determine which is the best. You will fight against the seven other clans in seven wars over seven days. At the end, clans that have earned the most stars are promoted to higher leagues while others stay or are demoted. Next month you will resume where you left off. The higher you can get, the more rewards and glory you can earn. Keep climbing upwards with your clan and you may eventually become the best in the world!
TID_WL_INFO_SIGNUP_TAB1_TEXT:
<cFCE27F>How can my clan participate?</c>

Leaders and Co-leaders can sign your Clan up during the opt-in period. If you are participating for the first time, you will be placed into a league tier based on the strength of your fifteen strongest members. Once seven other Clans from your league tier have been found, preparation for the first round will begin immediately!<cFCE27F>

My Clan isn't very strong. Should we participate?</c>

Yes! As long as you have at least fifteen members, you should participate. You can earn great rewards even if you don't get promoted to a higher league tier!
TID_WL_INFO_SIGNUP_TAB2_TEXT:
<cFCE27F>What do we get out of Clan War Leagues?</c>

Glory of course! But there are also exclusive rewards that you can only get from participating in Clan War Leagues! Earning Stars during battle week will earn you League Medals. The higher your league tier, the more League Medals you will earn. You can exchange your hard-earned League Medals in the Shop for rare Magic Items and other unique prizes.

<cFCE27F>Are there other ways to earn League Medals?</c>

Clan leadership can award a limited number of bonus Medals to anyone participating, even if they didn't fight! You get more and bigger bonuses in higher league tiers, with each win giving you an extra one!
